The Last Frontier Brewery is a family run business, by Alaskans for Alaskans and visitors to Alaska.

Our brewery offers beers that have world-class flavor, from the lightest roasted malt to the aromatic bouquet of fine hops. These recipes that we have developed involve a very strict process that has to be meticulously monitored step by step to ensure the highest quality available. We also incorporate our brews into many items on our menu.
name: Last Frontier Brewing Company

description: At the start of 2013, Penge in SE London gained it's first and BEST brewery, yesss. Not only is the beer hand crafted, but the brewery was hand built by little beavers named Martyn, Mik, Steve and Sam; taking a derelict victorian slaughterhouse and fixing it up good and proper. This is something we're most proud of, as it's generally not the done thing! But every part that we completed was a milestone, making us even more fond of our brewery and the processes. And we are now capable of kicking out 100 casks of beer a week, and very happy to be here.
name: Late Knights

description: Regardless of the people and events, however, Latitude 33 is always synonymous with “Adventure” — which is also our brewing philosophy. We’re on an exploration that involves taking a few risks, trying new things and injecting a little of the unexpected into the world of craft beer. If you’re up for it, we’d like to invite you to come along. Just meet us at Latitude 33.
name: Latitude 33 Brewing Co.

description: Established in January, 2013 LauderAle is a small batch, electric fired brewery located just outside of Port Everglades in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Founded by natives, LauderAle is the first and only Nano Brewery in Southeast Florida. We pride ourselves in cultivating authentic ales centered around local culture and influence. Our beers range in a wide variety of rotating styles from Blondes to Imperial Stouts along with seasonal's and special releases. We also serve several guest taps from local Florida breweries.
name: LauderAle

description: At Laughing Dog Brewing, what began with a dream for brews with more hops has turned into an insatiable desire to craft beers of all flavors, with a focus on quality, purity, and fun. Today, Laughing Dog brews has brewed over 15 distinct beers, including seasonals like our Huckleberry Ale and Winter Ale, and our award-winning IPA's and Stouts. But despite our success and growth, our motto remains the same as the day we started, to create... "Fetchingly Good Beer"!
name: Laughing Dog Brewing

description: Laughing Sun Brewing Company is all about freshly hand-crafted American ales. We feature live music and local art.  Our regular tap selections include Strawberry Wheat, Whippin' Post Pale Ale, Hammerhead Red ESB, Feast Like a Sultan IPA, Black Shox Porter, and Sinister Pear. We also have seasonal selections, and one-time tapping events throughout the year.
name: Laughing Sun Brewing Company

description: Launch Pad Brewery is a veteran owned and operated micro brewery specializing in handcrafted brews made from the finest ingredients.
name: Launch Pad Brewery

description:
Meadery focused on small-batch handcrafted mead. 
Producing Traditional, Bochet, Hopped, and spiced varieties of mead (Honey-Wine).
name: Laurel Highlands Meadery

description:
Hi, my name is Mike De Kalb, and I’m the co-owner of Laurelwood Public House & Brewery in Portland, Oregon. My wife Cathy and I started Laurelwood in 2001 because we wanted a place where family and friends could meet in a fun and relaxed atmosphere. My restaurants are non-smoking and family-friendly.

And the beer? World class. Brewing Portland’s first certified organic beers, and a host of other tasty brews. We’ve received a number of awards including Champion Brewery at the 2004 World Beer Cup. Led by Brewmaster Vasilios Gletsos, our brewers create all our beers using only the finest ingredients. Stop by one of our three public houses and or one of our two Portland airport locations for a pint and a meal.   Make sure when you are out and about that you ask for Laurelwood beer at your favorite Oregon or Washington pub.
name: Laurelwood Brewing Company

description:
Lavery Brewing Company was founded in 2009 by husband and wife Jason & Nicole Lavery. Jason Lynch joined the quest in 2010 to build our own 10 barrel production brewery. Born and raised around Erie, PA, we are all excited to bring something new and dynamic to the local beer culture - Brewing Innovative Ales in Small Batches!

By the way, it's pronounced 'Lav-ry' not 'Lave ry', a soft 'a' in the middle. Similar to 'have', not 'gave', thank you very much.
name: Lavery Brewing Company

description: Lawson’s Finest Liquids, LLC is based in Warren, Vermont and distributes small, custom batches of unique beer through their exclusive wholesale distributor, The Beer Guy, LLC. Sean Lawson, founder and brewer, has been an avid home brewer for nearly twenty years, with numerous award winning recipes. Lawson’s Finest, with a small batch system, can custom craft specialty beers for establishments and events. Limited in availability by design, these rare beers can only be found near the Mad River Valley of Vermont.
name: Lawson's Finest Liquids

description: Deep in the mountains of North Carolina, just off the Appalachian Trail, sits Franklin, NC. In the old Town Hall on the end of Main Street we're crafting beer and community that's fresh and honest. Untie your boots and enjoy the view - no matter how hard you hiked to get there.
name: Lazy Hiker Brewing Co.

description:
Founded in September of 2003, Lazy Magnolia is Mississippi's first brewery offering locally brewed beer to Mississippians and visitors to our state at all of their favorite restaurants. Located in the Bootleg capital of Mississippi, we break with tradition by offering legal brew to our customers!

Lazy Magnolia is dedicated to providing the best possible products through our tireless efforts, our superior motivation, and our Southern heritage. We offer our customers a line of refreshing beverages, made in true Southern Style, complementing the traditions of the South and remaining true to Southern tastes.
name: Lazy Magnolia Brewing Company

description:
Lazy Monk Brewing LLC was created out of desire to serve local people with good quality beers. We specialize in brewing Bohemian and German Lagers but we do not shy away from British or American beers.

Craft Brewery that will be focusing on Bohemian and German beer styles but will not shy away from ales.
name: Lazy Monk Brewing

description:
Le Brewery is a family run business, founded by Steve Skews in 2001. We share a passion for beer which is crafted by hand using only the finest ingredients without any nasties in sight.

France is not a country noted for its beers, however, we've been on a mission to introduce good beer to Normandy. Le Brewery is located in the heart of cider country and produces British style real ale for the French market.

Our beer is brewed on a 10-barrel brew plant, with all natural top quality ingredients and live yeast for a superior taste. We produce a number of ‘house’ beers from the hoppy Norman Gold to our rich English milk stout, Odo.
name: Le Brewery

description: The beer of the Lord for charm, character and passion. Italian craft beer of superior quality, designed with passion.
name: Le Signore brewing co.

description: The Devil's Hole is a place of culinary discovery. Here you will have the chance to enjoy unique beers that will satisfy your taste buds as well as your appetite will be filled by the merits of his dishes.
name: Le Trou Du Diable

description:
Leamside Brewery only source the finest possible ingredients for all of our beers. Our malt is provided by Thomas Fawcett and sons. Based in Castleford Fawcett’s have been producing traditional floor malted barley for over 200 years. Traditional Maris Otter pale ale malt is the mainstay of most of our recipes.

This is supplemented to varying degrees with a variety of speciality malts to enhance the flavour and colour characteristics of each brew. The hops are supplied by Charles Faram and Simply Hops. We use both leaf and pelleted hops from the UK, Europe, America and the New World. A careful blend is used to create the distinctive aroma and taste profiles of each recipe.
name: Leamside Brewery

description: Leech Lake Brewing Company is a production (packaging) brewery located just outside of downtown Walker in the Chippewa National Forest.
name: Leech Lake Brewing

description:
We do not pitch any wild yeasts into our alchemy. Our magic is performed the old fashioned way.

Each and every beer is hand-made in small batches, using age old techniques of open fermentation, barrel aging and bottle conditioning.
name: Leelanau Brewing

description:
Left Coast Brewing Company was formed in 2004 with a capacity of 5,500 bbls.  Since then, we have expanded our operation to 13,000 bbls with our current tanks.  Our main focus for the Left Coast are Hoppy Beers, Stouts, and German Lagers. We do however add new styles as part of our seasonal program and have one Belgian tripel ale.

We brew, bottle and keg everything in house at our San Clemente facility and our team is dedicated to the perfection of our product.
name: Left Coast Brewing

description:
Know that feeling you get on opening day, after a walk-off home run or a suspenseful no-hitter? That’s exactly how we feel about beer.

We started Left Field Brewery under a simple philosophy: that great beer is about great taste and good times. We’re not here to confuse you with jargon or gimmicky promises - we’re here to make distinct, flavourful beers that can stand on taste alone. We’re brewing the kind of beer that we like to drink, inspired by the sport we love to play and watch; the kind of beer you can sit and enjoy during the game while talking shop over a blown call or a spectacular play. 

Left Field Brewery aims to make beers you’ll remember. We’re free agent brewers who started out in the minors as a hobby home-brewery. We’re currently contract brewing with a game plan to build a microbrewery in Toronto to call home.
name: Left Field Brewery

description: Left Hand Brewing Company has been brewing world class, award winning beers since its founding in 1993. They see their beers as a wonderful liquid food to complement meals and social occasions. They strive for the perfect balance and harmony between malt and hops in every beer, from a golden crisp Polestar Pilsner to a roasty, black Wake Up Dead Imperial Stout,  —allowing a truly unique and flavorful with every glass.
name: Left Hand Brewing Company

description: Lefty's Brewing Company is owned and operated by Bill “Lefty” Goldfarb in Bernardston, MA. This nano-brewery is a home brewer's dream come true. Bill, who has been a roofer by day and a home brewer by night for almost a decade, has finally decided to provide his popularly sought-after product to the public. He has traveled as far as Wisconsin to obtain equipment for his two barrel brewhouse. He is excited to finally put down the hammer and dedicate his full attention to commercially brewing his fine-tuned recipes. Bill, who firmly believes a local, family business offers the best service and product, is proud to have a family-run business operated by only him and his girlfriend. His product is hand-bottled and labeled. As of now, the beer is available in Franklin County, MA, with a wider distribution area in the future. Lefty creates high quality beers using only the finest quality ingredients available. He focuses on the simple pleasures of the traditional and time-tested European brewing techniques. Lefty looks forward to sharing 6 year-round beers, with seasonal and specialty batches offered throughout the year.
name: Lefty's Brewing Company

description: Legacy Brewing Co. is committed to handcrafting unique, high quality beer by employing brewing techniques learned from European and American brewers. The complexity of flavors comes from a combination of high quality imported malts and our hopping methods which includes the use of whole flower hops. The Legacy team includes a creative collection of brewers, engineers, a microbiologist and our friends in the arts community; all with a passion for innovative products. Legacy...we brew pure pleasure!
name: Legacy Brewing Company

description:
The Brewer, Mark Mericle:
Mark's legacy is quite simple. While visiting relatives in Bavaria, Germany and having traveled numerous times to the great brewing countries of the UK and Europe, Mark came to this simple conclusion, “American beers are boring and just are not very satisfying”. In Europe and the UK every area had its own local brewery and the beer was fresh and had flavor and a lot of body. So his quest to bring premium fresh flavorful beers to his town was born.

Working as an apprentice with some of the original craft brewers in California, it gave him an a working knowledge and appreciation as well as insight into the business of craft beer. Heritage Brewing was co-founded by Mark in 1989 and was Orange County’s first micro brewery (brewpub) and they also became known as the premier live blues venue in the OC. Several years later Mark founded his production facility in Riverside County and produced products under Heritage’s label as well as producing white label products for restaurants such as Claim Jumper, Wahoo’s, BJ’s Pizza, etc. In addition, Mark's facility produced and packaged many bottled products that have sold in all major retailers throughout So Cal.

Mark has brewed on various systems from 7bbl to 110 bbl, as well as installations and recipe formulations for many local brewpubs. Mark has received numerous awards from local beer festivals, state fairs, national and international beer festivals. Having received over 20 awards ranging from best of show, blue ribbons, bronze, silver and gold, with a Gold medal at the Great American Beer Festival, you can rest assured that the philosophy surrounding Mark, is a quality product every time. Mark's Nut Brown Ale was also celebrated in Michael Jacksons world pocket guide to beer as “world class” .
name: Legacy Brewing Company

description: Legal Remedy Brewing was founded in 2009 by five Fort Mill, SC friends who turned their collective passion for making and enjoying great beer into a craft brewing business.  After entering and winning their first formal homebrewing contest in 2012, the group continued to refine their recipes and hired its first full-time brewmaster in 2014. In 2015 a vacant Rock Hill, SC car dealership was purchased and converted into a craft brewery and brewpub.  With over 11,000 square feet of space, the brewpub houses a 17-barrel brewing system along with two smaller brewing systems which can collectively produce 10,000 barrels of beer per year. Legal Remedy Brewing beers, including Alibi Ale, Witness White IPA, Sequestered Saison and Pro Bono Porter are presently served at the brewpub alongside food that is just as crafty as the beer.  In addition to on-site sales in pints, growlers and kegs, Legal Remedy Brewing beers are available in restaurants and retailers throughout South Carolina.
name: Legal Remedy Brewing Co.

description: Legend Brewing Company is a commercial microbrewery providing true premium beers to many of the best pubs and restaurants in Richmond and other areas of Virginia since January, 1994. Our mission is to bring to our customers the finest and freshest brews as flavorful alternatives to mass-marketed mainstream products. We're one of the few craft breweries in this region producing both lagers and ales, which require different yeasts and maturation conditions. All Legend beers are unpasteurized and made from only two-row and specialty barley malt, hops, water and yeast.
name: Legend Brewing Company
Legends Brewhouse & Eatery of Green Bay

description:
The Lena Brewing Company, located on the outskirts of Lena, Illinois…west of Chicago, south of Madison, and far from ordinary. A place in the country where men are men, women are appreciated, and beer is brewed in earnest and drank with vigor.

Here, every beer has a story. Brewed with a respect for traditional ways while exploring new approaches, the art of brewing finds a wanting public here in the heartland.
name: Lena Brewing Company

description:
Lengthwise Brewing Company was established in 1998 in order to follow the Great American Dream of turning passion into product. Initially, the creative partners divided their time between their "day jobs" and what is now regarded as Kern County's most popular micro-brewery. The production system includes a 14 Barrel Liquid Asset brewhouse and four 14 Barrel fermenters. Long hours and no pay almost never discouraged the inspired from taking a risk to pursue their heart's desire.

Childhood friends, Jeff Williams and Darin Schwicker, are transplants from California's Central Coast. Forged by a friendship of competitive swimming and unsuccessful fishing, the two vowed to create a brewed product "true" to their Lengthwise philosophy. Jeff's worldwide experience of designing and setting up breweries in such remote locations as the Caribbean, Ukraine, Russia and Japan certainly contributed to his vision for developing a brewery.
name: Lengthwise Brewing Co

description: Lenny Boy was founded in 2011 with an interest in a healthy lifestyle, a passion for fermentation and an obsession with brewing. The company started off producing non-alcoholic kombucha with one 7 bbl fermenting tank. In 2012, we stumbled upon our current facility in the historic SouthEnd district in Charlotte, NC. In January of 2013 Lenny Boy became the only Certified Organic kombucha producer in the Southeast! In September 2013, we took it a step further and became a licensed microbrewery.  In doing so, we became the only certified organic brewery North Carolina! The new license allowed us to diversify our product line, which now includes kombucha, wild ales, and traditional beers. We currently produce 100 bbl of kombucha every month and have a 7 bbl traditional beer brewing system. Our kombucha can be found from Virginia to Alabama and our beers are currently within North Carolina.  ENJOY!
name: Lenny Boy Brewing Co.

description: Leprechaun Premium Hard Ciders are artisanal American ciders produced from fresh, hand-picked cider apples fermented with premium Champagne yeasts.
name: Leprechaun Cider Company

description:
In a time in Northern France where trucks and commercial transportation were not yet a part of daily life, the process of brewing beer was a very different one than it is today. In small villages across Europe, it was the local brewer that filled the vessels of pubs and cafés with beer made from his own closely guarded recipes. With the advent of industrialization, however, local breweries all but disappeared, bringing to an end the era of the authentic microbrewery.

Twenty years ago, a family of brewers decided to revive the traditions of the past that were deeply rooted in three generations of their family – thus the name The 3 Brewers – “three” for three generations of brewing tradition. The 3 Brewers opened its very first microbrewery restaurant in Place de la Gare à Lille in 1986. Since then operations have expanded to 28 locations in France as well as several restaurants in other parts of the world including Quebec and soon Ontario.

Les 3 Brasseurs' success can be attributed to a unique concept: Fresh non-pasteurized beer made from the purest ingredients and from traditional recipes – all brewed right at the heart of each of our restaurants for patrons to see.
name: Les 3 Brasseurs

description:
Founded in Douai in 1919, this brewery is still a traditional, independent family business. In Gayant Brewers, it is still beer as we raise up a good wine preferring quality over quantity, traditional methods to industrial production. 
The brewery now produces 250,000 hectoliters sold in kegs, bottles and cans. 
Positioned in the market for specialty beers, Gayant Brewers are true pioneers. 
Thanks to a perfect knowledge of the development process coupled with the highest quality ingredients and a permanent curiosity Gayant Brewers are at the origin of 7 specialty beers which all have a distinct personality and a popular inimitable taste consumer.
name: Les Brasseurs de Gayant

description:
Les Soeurs Grises is an artisan microbrewery that lets you boast in our unique and savoury beers. Our innovative cuisine with its own smokehouse makes for any night. We offer many privately imported beers as well. This exquisite dining experience is offered to you on the magnificent and previous site of the Soeurs Grises Congregation in Old Montreal!

The Soeurs Grises chose this name, not because of a particular color use for their attire (Grises = Grey), but mostly as a sign of humility regarding mocking accusations made by the New-France population in the 1700! They accused the founder, Marguerite d'Youville, to maliciously attract the poor to a large cellar filled with alcohol to "help" them!

Indeed, Marguerite d'Youville late husband, Mr François d'Youville, had a prosperous, illegal alcohol business with the Native Americans! It was then natural to believe that his stock did not go to Heaven with him!
name: Les Soeurs Grises

description: Canadian microbrewery, brewing mostly European/German style beers.
name: Les Trois Mousquetaires

description:
Levante started as many home brewing dreams start; the mission to create the perfect beer in a three gallon pot in the kitchen of a small apartment. Eric and Tim quickly realized that this is an excercise in futility, but along the way, their steadfast persistence and the quest to make a truly satisfying beer has resulted in countless hours of research and experimentation. While the small 5 gallon batches allowed for plenty of great experience, they yearned for more creative control.

The brewers decided it was time for a more professional three vessel system, giving them complete control over the brewing process. The 1/2 barrel system gave the brewers a solid platform to refine and perfect a lineup of beers for the most discerning pallet. This led to the creation of several great recipes, and a roster of clean crisp beers. The original hobby transformed into a passion for sharing world-class hand crafted beers with those who would appreciate them. 

Levante Brewing currently brews on our 15 bbl production brewery system located in West Chester, PA. We are servicing several local restaurants, pubs and distributers. Levante aims to deliver a variety of creative brews to beer lovers in Philadelphia's western suburbs and beyond.
name: Levante Brewing Company

description: The great explorers are the inspiration for our breweries name and in many ways our brewing style. It's also where we live as we are located in the heart of the only Lewis & Clark County in the US. Our secret ingredient is the pride and craftsmanship added by dedicated people lucky enough to be called Montanans. Since our beginning, we have gone to the greatest of lengths to build one of the most efficient, sophisticated breweries around with one goal in mind: to produce the finest ales and lagers possible and serve them at their peak of freshness.
name: Lewis & Clark Brewing Company

description: LBC is still in the planning stages.  We are developing a business plan and seeking investors to help fund our startup.  Inquiries are welcome.
name: Lewistown Brewing Co

description: Good times await in Asheville at the Lexington Avenue Brewery. Relax a while on our open air patio. Enjoy a craft beer and an incredible meal at the 92’ curving bar or a custom built dining table. Our historic downtown Asheville building provides the perfect atmosphere. The front stage regularly entertains LAB guests during dinner hours.
name: Lexington Avenue Brewery

description:
Think Globally, Drink Locally

Located in historic Lexington, MI the winery offers many award winning wines AND CRAFT BEER for samples, by the glass, and by the bottle. Wine makers Connie Currie and Steven Velloff have created a warm and inviting atmosphere  "Where the past meets the present and good friends come to meet."
name: Lexington Brewing Company and Wine House

description:
The Leyden Brewery opened in 1999 with a view to brew on a small scale. However, since then the demand for Leyden Ales has increased significantly, the brewery brews four times a week to meet the demand. 

Along with regular brews there are also seasonal and themed ales, dependant on the time of year. Look out for our bi-annual beer festival to sample guest beers and new ales from the Leyden Brewery.
name: Leyden Brewery

description:
The Liberal Cup Public House and Brewery opened its doors in Hallowell in 2000. Since then, we’ve developed a following who truly appreciates our brews and food in a comfortable atmosphere. As the name suggests, we believe in quanity as well as quality. Whether it’s one of our standard 20oz pints or a heaping plate of Fish and Chips, we guarantee you won’t leave our pub thirsty or hungry.

Beer holds a special place in our hearts and minds; it’s our life mission to pour you the perfect pint. Throughout the year we produce 21 different ales and lagers, each one with a distinct character. We run the gamut from a Pilsner to a Cask-Conditioned Bitter to an Oatmeal Stout. You’ll have to drop in to see what’s on tap at any given time, because 115 Water Street is the only place in the world you’ll find our brews. As we like to say: “Brewed in Hallowell, Drunk in Hallowell”.

If for some silly reason your friends don’t drink beer, we also have a full wine and liquor selection. And because everyone likes to eat, we produce loads of fresh, home-made meals that appeal to all appetites. So, please come visit us and enjoy all the charm of an English pub, without the hassle of going through customs.
name: Liberal Cup Public House and Brewery

description: A micro brewery with two locations: the original brew pub in Morro Bay and the newly opened 9000 ft2 Libertine Brewery in San Luis Obispo.
name: Libertine Brewing Company

description: Liberty means many things to many different people. It's a celebration of the great American farmer and the rich bounty he puts on our plates.  It's a celebration of America's rich ethnic cooking styles. It's a celebration of the resurgence of the handcrafted-brewing style of the pre-prohibition small American brewery.  Liberty Steakhouse & Brewery is based on America's rich ethnic cooking styles, complimented by finely hand-crafted beers, tantalizing starters and perfectly seared steaks. We've got something brewing you're sure to like. Liberty is also a celebration of life, family and the pursuit of happiness. So bring us your hungry, your thirsty and fun-loving, we'll send you home refreshed and fulfilled.
name: Liberty Steakhouse and Brewery

description:
Liberty Street Brewing Company began in concept back in 2006, and finally became a reality in the fall of 2008.  We provide an elegant atmosphere where people can enjoy a fine, hand crafted beer in Plymouth, Michigan’s historic Old Village.

Our focus is to provide a large assortment of crafted, small batch ales and lagers through an exceptionally service oriented waitstaff.  We also offer a short list of regularly available food items during all hours of operation, and have special food items to be served during happy hour, weekends and special occasions.  Several local restaurants  deliver other fresh meals right to your table – just ask us for their carry-out menus.

The Upper Hall at the brewery can be reserved for private parties for up to 70 people.  It is a large area with separate restroom facilities, and a small service bar.  The Upper Hall has a sound and video system that can be used for business presentations, home movies, etc.  Inquire for details.
name: Liberty Street Brewing Company

description:
Lickinghole Creek Craft Brewery is a water-conscious, biologically friendly farm brewery carefully crafting Belgium-style beers and growing hops, barley and other adjuncts. See our Farm Plan 2014 and read about the barley, hops, strawberries, pumpkins and the upcoming new additions of figs trees, blueberries, herbs, sunflowers, additional pumpkin terraced fields and a hardy orange tree grove.  Farmer Russell has ordered our new additions and will be breaking ground this February. We operate on a beautiful working farm in the heart of Virginia.

Lickinghole Creek is a water-conscious brewery.  We brew with well water drawn from the deep.  Our wastewater is purified on site and returned to the Lickinghole Creek watershed.

Our name pays homage to Little Lickinghole Creek, which runs through the farm’s rolling hills.  Since precolonial times the creek has been known as the Lickinghole where wildlife stopped to drink from the nourishing waters.  May the tradition continue.
name: Lickinghole Creek Craft Brewery

description: Lidskoe beer , one of the oldest breweries republic in 2006 celebrated its 130 th anniversary. Brewing traditions, the experience of master brewers, passed down from generation to generation, a constant retooling of production - these ingredients for success, allowing the company to produce quality and marketable produktsiyu. OAO "Lida Beer" - the only company brewing industry of the country, received an international certificate of food safety Product ISO 22000:2005, ensuring consumer safety by an enterprise product.
name: Lidskoe

description: Welcome to Lift Bridge Beer Company. Our mission is simple: to create fine beers for you to enjoy! It is our pleasure to supply you with what you need to help you slow down and enjoy life. Whether that is a Farm Girl Saison®, Crosscut Pale Ale™, an American Pale Ale or any of our other seasonal specialties, we want to brew it our way! We hope that through every bottle and tap pull, you can taste: the history of our City, the pride and fun we have in its creation, the uncompromising natural ingredients and brewing process utilized, and ultimately our sincere hope that we have given an experience that makes you proud to be a beer drinker.
name: Lift Bridge Brewing Co.

description:
Our fine hand crafted European style beers have a distinctive Lightning Finish: a crisp, clean aroma, pronounced maltiness and a prolonged and slightly bittering finish. Our beers are good to drink on their own, and great with food. We have proven that you don’t need to travel to Europe to enjoy beers of these styles and of this caliber!

At Lightning we brew “Better Beer Through Science.” We believe that good beer can be the result of chance and that great beer is the result of an in-depth understanding of the beer making process. We take care to control each stage of the brewing cycle, never skimp on how long each step takes and only use the highest quality ingredients: malted barley, hops, yeast, plus a healthy dose of science.
name: Lightning Brewery

description:
Lily's Seafood has been delivering exquisite seafood in a relaxed and comfortable environment since 1999. The Morton brothers opened the restaurant with a passion at heart to bring unique, quality food, perfectly crafted micro-brews and a cozy, relaxed, family friendly atmosphere to downtown Royal Oak . That passion is evident in every dish and pint they serve.

It is in the spirit of the Morton brother's grandmother Lily A. Strange, a Scottish immigrant who brought to this country her love of family, sense of style, and appreciation of fine food that Lily's was created. The Morton brothers have recreated the feeling of their grandparent's home inside the walls of Lily's, tucked into Royal Oak 's vibrant downtown. Lily's is a place to gather and to share not only fine food and drink, but laughter, love, conversation, and fond memories.
name: Lily's Seafood Grill & Brewery

description: Lincoln Brewing Co. has 24 taps of beers brewed on sight and note-worthy guest taps. We also offer a full service liquor bar, an arcade room, and food delivered from Camos Brothers Pizza.
name: Lincoln Brewing Co.

description: Lincoln Court Brewery is a two partner owned/operated Incorporated Nano-Brewery located in San Jose serving the local community with custom made beers.
name: Lincoln Court Brewery

description: Lineage Brewing® was founded with a simple purpose: create a welcoming social atmosphere where friends can gather and learn about high-quality beer. Like many great discoveries, it was founded in neighborhood Clintonville garages, where homebrew flowed and hops grew up backyard trellises. When creativity, aspirations, and equipment got a little too large for our tiny garages the inevitable craft brewery was born. We continue to be grounded in family, friends, beer education, and the quest for the ever perfect pint. We focus on the range of flavors beer can provide, and offer an ever-changing variety of styles in our brewpub. We hope you enjoy the inquisitive and explorative approach to brewing that Lineage Brewing brings to the Columbus beer scene. And in doing so, we hope that you try something unlike anything you’ve had before.
name: Lineage Brewing

description:
With a proud brewing heritage dating back to 1905, The Lion Brewery merges rustic architecture with state-of-the-art brewing technology, a contrast typified by the gleaming stainless steel aging tanks that sit alongside the traditional copper brew kettle. Our brewing process utilizes the traditional English method of upward infusion mashing in our combination mash lauter tun to create lagers and ales inspired by old world values, but with modern quality and consistency. The staff at The Lion Brewery is dedicated to producing true handcrafted beers, made right here in our century-old Brewhouse. All of our premium beers are made using only the four basic ingredients allowed by the Reinheitsgebot, or German purity law. Under the skillful supervision of our Master Brewer, Leo Orlandini, each of our lagers and ales are brewed in small batches using only the finest hops and malts available to guarantee the highest quality and freshness. Each product we brew is an original recipe especially created to deliver a fuller flavor than ordinary beers, yet with an approachable style and character. As a result, our beers have garnered numerous medals from the Great American Beer Festival and the World Beer Championships in recent years.

In 1974 the Lion Brewing Company bought the Stegmaier Brand.
name: Lion Brewery

description: Lion Bridge Brewing Company is a 10-barrel brewery located on the property of the former Fritz’s Food Market at 59 16th Avenue SW (Czech Village in Cedar Rapids, Iowa).
name: Lion Bridge Brewing Company

description: Lion is a leading beverage and food company with a portfolio that includes many of Australia and New Zealand’s favourite brands. Lion was formed in October 2009 under the name ‘Lion Nathan National Foods’, when Kirin Holdings Company Limited completed its purchase of Lion Nathan and merged the business with National Foods – which it has owned since 2007. In 2011, we became known as Lion.
name: Lion Co

description: Liquid Mechanics Brewing Co. is a small yet mighty, neighborhood craft brewery in Lafayette, Colorado. We believe that great beer is honest and doesn't cut corners, it connects people to the things that matter, and — sometimes — a little rebellion is good for the soul. Cheers!
name: Liquid Mechanics Brewing Co.

description: The Liquid Riot Bottling Company was established on the waterfront in Portland’s Old Port, just blocks from City Hall and the location of the Portland Rum Riot, in homage to those that fought for their beverage of choice. As Maine’s first Brewery/Distillery/Resto-Bar, we take all the passion and energy of these past riots and put it into our own liquids, bottled or on tap, made fresh locally for your enjoyment.
name: Liquid Riot Bottling Company

description: We began back in the 1991 with the famous "Phil's Philler," a bottle filler that leaves the liquid level at just about the same point after you remove it from the bottle, and still the state of the art in homebrew bottle fillers. Having helped countless home brewers get off the ground, Dan decided to open his own brewery in 2008. LBC is committed to putting our own unique twist on traditional styles.
name: Listermann Brewing Company

description: Lithermans Limited Brewing Company is 6 BBL brewery planing to open in Spring 2016. Our goal is to hand-craft unique, artisan ales and lagers to be packaged and sold in New Hampshire, at finer restaurants and beer stores throughout the state, as well as directly from our brewery's tasting room.
name: Lithermans Limited Brewery

description:
After many trials and experimentations, our first beer, Little Creatures Pale Ale, was proudly presented to the Australian market just in time for the summer of 2001.

Throughout the years, we’ve created a little family of beers that we brew today with the same enthusiasm and drive as the day we began. And while we continue to grow and stretch our horizons, we are still excited by and are motivated to make better beer with greater consistency each and every day.

We welcome you to share our passion for great beer, where ever you are.
name: Little Creatures Brewery

description: A tiny start up brewery in Southern Illinois (Egypt) specializing in recognizable stylistic beers.
name: Little Egypt Beer

description: A Fledgling Brewery in the Friendly City. Opening fall of 2013
name: Little Giant Brewery

description: New brewery, founded by industry veterans, in the Jefferson Park neighborhood of Denver.
name: Little Machine Beer

description: Brew your own beer, taste ours, or grab a couple bombers or growlers to go. We have kegs, and brew hand crafted beer for parties, graduations, weddings, re-unions, and other events.
name: Little Mountain Brewing Company

description:
Little Toad Creek Brewery & Distillery is a craft producer of beer and spirits. The Brewery currently produces Amber Ale, Stout, Porter, and IPA. The Distillery produces vodka, silver rum, & spiced rum, green chile vodka, and whiskey (in limited quantities!)

Our new tasting room has just opened in downtown Silver City serving craft beer, spirits, and fine pub food.
name: Little Toad Creek Brewery

description: Live Oak Brewing Company is truly a home-grown Austin enterprise. Two of Austin's own homebrews, Chip McElroy and Brian Peters, literally hand-built the brewery and were the two main brewers, keg washers, delivery persons, and proselytizers. Live Oak has grown since then, but we are still just as passionate about providing delicious old-world style beers that are rarely commercially available. Our special beers are brewed in limited quantities in a small east Austin brewery and are available in fine pubs and restaurants in Austin, Dallas, Houston, Alpine, Marathon, San Marcos and San Antonio.
name: Live Oak Brewing Company

description:
We are a dog friendly brewery & taproom located in Highlands Ranch, Colorado. 

Multiple beers brewed year long to quench your thirst during any activity. From a vigorous game of badminton to an afternoon of rev-ing your 2-stroke noise maker at a Nascar race, we've got ya covered.
name: Living The Dream Brewing Co.

description: Livingood's is a full service restaurant, pub and brewery in Peru, NY perfect for your friends and family, offering hardy food and local craft beer.
name: Livingood's Restaurant & Brewery

description: A craft brewery located in the 3-1-5 supporting local products and local people
name: Local 315 Brewing Company

description:
Our Mission.
Craft.  This single word means a great deal to us at Lock 27 Brewing.  We use it daily to guide us in producing only the best for our customers.  To us, it's more than just a label.  It's about the quality of the ingredients and the care we take to prepare them.  It's about the creative thought process.  It's about seeing rules as suggestions.  Whether it's our in house premium craft beers, or the fresh dishes prepared in our eclectic kitchen, we strive to provide everyone we encounter with a true craft experience.
name: Lock 27 Brewing

description:
Welcome to Lockdown Brewing Co., the “Home of the Folsom Prison Brews.”  Lockdown Brewing Co. brews craft ales for the enjoyment of beer lovers of all levels from the true connoisseur to the weekend beer lover. 
The beers of Lockdown Brewing Co. are hand crafted with all natural ingredients without adjuncts such as cereal, rice or fillers. Our beers are superior because of the brewmaster's attention to detail, his complete love of brewing and the freshness of the beer.

The beers are named in the spirit of the history of Folsom, CA. Lockdown Brewing Co. exhibits the rich history of Folsom and the Folsom Prison through its identity and labeling.  Folsom was home to many firsts.  It was the home to the first Railroad in the West and the first city to transport electricity over the wire over several miles, 22 to be exact. The prison is California’s second oldest and has been made famous thru media like Johnny Cash’s “Folsom Prison Blues” and the movie "Walk the Line".

We invite you to sample our fine ales and enjoy the great taste and absorb the long history of Folsom.
name: Lockdown Brewing Co

description: At the Lodi Beer Company, most days you’ll find the staff minding your pints and quarts. Our old world atmosphere and the friendly, fun personalities of the people who work here, give the wood, stone and steel architecture the warmth of a bygone era. Since opening LBC it has been a place for families and friends to relax, eat lots of great food and have a pint of beer. To add to all of that we also have a full bar ready to accommodate the non beer drinkers, we know you are out there so don't be shy and give us a try.
name: Lodi Beer Company

description: Loe's Brewing Company features handcrafted artisanal beers made with local ingredients of the highest quality using malted barley, fresh  hops, Appalachian Mountain waters and fresh cultured yeast. All Natural Beer with No additives, No extracts, and no shortcuts to provide you with the finest, freshest beer . We are also a Gastropub , Chef Stephen Loe uses local and seasonal ingredients to create an ever-changing menu of exciting , flavorful dishes from around the world. Influenced by many chefs, and culinary styles Loe focuses on Southern American, French, Cajun -Creole, and Indian. Stephen Loe has won many awards for his cooking and beers and is a graduate of the prestigious Culinary Institute of America in Hyde Park NY. He has worked at many fine restaurants in New York , Emerils, Sonoma California Bistro, Barringtons, and Artisanal before starting his own. Loe's is a great mountain destination with great food, great beer, souvenirs,gifts,live music and a fun , friendly atmosphere with outdoor seating in the historic downtown area. Please come make Loe's your North Carolina Mountain tradition!
name: Loe's Brewing Company

description: Loe's Brewing Company  is a small craft brewery located in Hickory North Carolina. We specialize in handcrafted artisanal lagers and ales. We are one of the smallest breweries in North Carolina and also one of the smallest in the country. We have a 1.5 bbl brewhouse , 1 and 3 bbl fermentation tanks. Being so small we can afford to take more time and effort into our beers. We utilize many ingredients from all over the world, selecting only the finest grains, cultured yeast, fresh whole hops, and  our mountain water that is perfect for producing the best beers possible.  Another advantage of being small is that we can produce a wide variety of styles so our selection will always be changing. We will produce beers that fit the season and year round classics. Loe's Brewing takes pride in producing the finest handcrafted beers, and we are sure that once you try our beer you will agree that bigger is not always better , and will notice the difference that craft beer has to offer.  Cheers- The Loe's Brewing Team
name: Loe's Brewing Company

description: First and foremost, we're all beer lovers! Having said that, the Logan Shaw Brewing Company (LSBC) brings a team of managers who are experts in business, construction, beverage alcohol, retail, science, and finance. The majority of the team is from the Maryland area and has created many business and personal relationships throughout the region, which will be an integral component to the company since acquiring Wild Goose Ale.
name: Logan Shaw Brewing Company

description:
Here at Logboat we brew the beers we like to drink. We constantly try to innovate and push ourselves to brew new, unique, and interesting beers to keep things fresh and exciting. Beer is meant to be enjoyed with friends and family in a social setting.  We try our best to provide both a great atmosphere for enjoying our craft, as well as an engaging, educational experience to become better acquainted with the Logboat brand. 
Explore…Dream…Discover
name: Logboat Brewing Company

description: Originally started in Tomahawk, WI.  LogJam Microbrewery is under new ownership and located in Unity, WI at Monster World campground.
name: Logjam Microbrewery

description:
Small farm brewery located in the upper Hood River Valley, OR.

We strive to create unique and intriguing beer. In the farmhouse brewery spirit, we use certified organic ingredients such as whole leaf hops, barley and wheat malts, groats(whole oats), and several strains of yeast. These are combined to make a product of uncompromising quality.
name: Logsdon Farmhouse Ales

description: Lolo Peak Brewing Company is a brewery in Lolo, Montana. Our craft beer is served through 12 taps and paired with our unique food dishes in our rustic taproom.
name: Lolo Peak Brewing Company

description:
The New Old Lompoc opened on May 6th, 2000. But the Old Lompoc Brewery (as it was formerly know) has been producing handcrafted ales and lagers since December 1996, while the tavern has been open since 1993.

The name originally came from the movie ‘The Bank Dick’ starring W.C. Fields and Mae West. Most of the movie took place in the ‘Old Lompoc House’, which was the local watering hole as well as a boarding house.

Our food menu is an excellent array of Northwest pub fare with a great selection of entrees, soups and salads. We have also remodeled the patio and added a sun deck.
name: Lompoc Brewing

description: Inspired by a drought of craft beer in Hackney – one of the most culturally vibrant areas in London – we thought it was about time Hackney had its very own brewery to provide home grown, handcrafted beers alongside the ever increasing amount of craft products being produced here. In August 2011, London Fields Brewery was born, based in the centre of Hackney, under the railway arches next to the oasis of greenery within the smoke that is London Fields itself. Now a part of a growing number of fine breweries in Hackney and London, we are proud to help spread the word of craft beer around the country and put Hackney on the map as a destination for great beer.
name: London Fields Brewery

description: Lone Peak Brewery is located in the Meadow Village Center, next to the Big Sky Post Office and Country Market. The "Brewski" building not only home to the First and only microbrewery in Big Sky, but home to the Gallatin River Gallery, a quaint gallery of local artists. Follow the highway signs from Highway 191 to Highway 64 and stop on by for a sample or pint of the best brew around. I kid you not!
name: Lone Peak Brewery

description: Scrumptious Texas Hoppy Ales
name: Lone Pint Brewery

description: Lone Tree Brewery: Micro-brewery in Gush Etzion. We produce crafted beers using only natural ingredients. E Mail info@LoneTreeBrewery.com Lone Tree is: John and Susan Levin David and Myriam Shire All are products are "Kosher Mehadrin, Gush Etzion"
name: Lone Tree Brewery

description: A craft brewery and tasting room: Small and family friendly, with an emphasis on sampling small-batch brews and sharing the experience with fellow beer lovers.
name: Lone Tree Brewing Company

description:
We opened our doors on January 23rd, 2009 and since then we have been impressed with the enthusiasm of craft beer aficionados we meet daily. The craft brewing industry is booming and you can find a tremendous variety out there. North Carolina has undoubtedly become the Southern State for beer with Asheville reigning supreme and Raleigh/Durham/CH not far behind. We hope you continue to support the variety and encourage new brewers to experiment with and craft new styles for everybody’s pleasure.

"Effect change; don't be an audience. Walk your own path, and instead of thinking outside the box, imagine if there was no box."
name: Lonerider Brewing Company

description: Lonesome Valley Brewing began as a dream of high quality craft brews, and a place where neighbors can get together and enjoy life in the heart of Prescott Valley. LVB is committed to serving the local community, and we want the  local guest to know that as soon as they hear our name. Our slogan embodies our mission, "Our Beer is Our Bond." We plan to keep the distance between  the brewer and the guest as small as possible to stay responsive to the changing needs and tastes of our community.
name: Lonesome Valley Brewing

description: Long Ireland Beer Company began a little differently then most businesses. Two friends had a crazy idea to go out and start a business because they wanted to do something they truly enjoyed. DRINK BEER!
name: Long Ireland Beer Company

description: The Award Winning Long Man Brewery is based at Church Farm, Litlington, Sussex in the Heart of the South Downs National Park.
name: Long Man Brewery

description: Long Trail Brewery is a microbrewery located in Bridgewater, Vermont, USA. It was opened in May of 1989 by Andy Pherson, who now serves both as the company's president and brewmaster. The company's first brewery was located in the basement of the Bridgewater Woolen Mill in Vermont's Green Mountains, but by 1995 the company had become popular enough that it was able to relocate to a state-of-the-art brewery and visitor center (featuring an open-air deck overlooking the Ottaquechee River) in Bridgewater Corners, VT.
name: Long Trail Brewing Co

description: Our award-winning brewer and outstanding culinary team develop a wide variety of unique beers and culinary creations to appeal to the diverse tastes of patrons.
name: Long Valley Brew Pub at Restaurant Village

description: Longleaf will be Greenville's first and only microbrewery. Longleaf will be a full and active member in the Uptown Greenville community by serving as an arts and entertainment staple in Greenville while catering to the increased demand for local craft beer and showcasing regional artwork and music.
name: Longleaf Brewing Company

description:
Longwood Brew Pub & Restaurant stands proud as the "jewel in the crown" of Longwood Station. Nestled within beautiful landscaping and natural west coast wilderness the Longwood Brew Pub is easily accessible via the Nanaimo Parkway from Victoria or Duke Point ferry terminal or the old Island Highway from Departure Bay ferry terminal and all points north. Longwood Brew Pub is central Vancouver Island's first Brew Pub and Nanaimo's favorite rendezvous destination.

The Brewery at the Longwood stands proud as one of the first images that you will see as you enter the main entrance. The Primary Brew House is located behind storefront glass on the left of our host- stand and is a flurry of activity as our brewer Harley Smith creates his magic and art 3 to 4 times a week. Every Saturday is tour day with reservations requested for the ever-popular 3:00 pm brewery tour and tasting. Only those patrons 19 or older may participate in the tasting component of the tour.
name: Longwood Brewpub

description: Freshly brewed beer. Made with love here on the front porch of Western North Carolina's Blue Ridge Mountains. Our little city in the clouds expects a lot out of our beer. In order to make sure we produce the best, our beer is sophisticatified with Mozart in full-effect during the fermentation process. With creativity and tradition combined, we are working hard to bring you the tastes you love. We can't wait to raise a glass and welcome you in for a cold beer.
name: Lookout Brewing Company

description: Serving Handcrafted Premium Ales
name: Loomis Basin Brewing Co

description:
Enjoy the historic building, unique atmosphere, fresh brick oven pizza and smooth craft beer. Loop Brewing Company is the perfect place to dine with your family and friends. Share a pint of fine, handcrafted beer within sight of the very brewing tanks that produced it.

Loop Brewing Company was established in 2011 in McCook, Nebraska. The brewery is situated along the railroad tracks that shaped the town nearly 130 years ago. Loop Brewing Company pays homage to its roots through an age-old tradition of quality, handcrafted brewing. Our beer is as rich as our heritage
name: Loop Brewing Company

description: The closure of Morland's in 2000 seemed to mean an end to Abingdon's illustrious brewing tradition. However in 2010 a new chapter opens with the launch of The Loose Cannon Brewery!
name: Loose Cannon

description: Loose Shoe Brewery is a microbrewery offering 6 revolving taps of unique and delicious craft beer made on the premises. Derin Foor, the owner and brewmaster, currently has 24 different recipes which allows him to provide a different experience weekly. We offer pints, half pints, and flights in our spacious and comfortable taproom with growlers available for purchase to fill and take home.  Visitors may also purchase a pint glass, hat, shirts, and gift certificates.  Although we do not serve food there is always hot fresh popcorn available and we encourage folks to bring in food from home or any of the local establishments.  Domino's is right next door as well as El Mariachi if you are in the mood for Mexican. Directly across the parking lots visitors can find a home cooked meal, sandwiches, and baked goods at What A Blessing. Our large patio is open with ample seating, live music, and even corn hole.
name: Loose Shoe Brewing Company

description: Established in 2012 by longtime Vancouver residents Devon Bray and Thomas Poffenroth, Loowit Brewing Company is the latest significant addition to underpin a revitalized downtown Vancouver, Washington. The company specializes in brewing small batch, hand crafted ales that are developed with a thoughtful approach balanced by a Pacific Northwest flair.
name: Loowit Brewing Company

description: Hoppy Ales from the Hills of Woburn
name: Lord Hobo Brewing Company

description:
In 1986, the Lord was taken over by its current custodians, including Managing Director Blair Hayden. With the aid of an 1852 photograph the new custodians took a beautiful old pub and restored it to its former Colonial glory. A stunning sandstone façade was revealed along with many convict made chisel marks on the locally quarried stone.

In keeping with the ambience of the architecture the new custodians were inspired to create beers in the style of the traditional English style ale with no added sugar and extremely full flavoured – instead of lager as made by the big Brewers dominating the market.

A microbrewery was built in the back area of the bar and cellar and the rest is history. Over a quarter century in fact.
name: Lord Nelson Brewery Hotel

description: We are a full service homebrew, vintner and soda supply store that has all of the ingredients and equipment you need to make great beverages at home.  Our microbrewery will be opening sometime in late 2011.  10% discount on most supplies and equipment for AHA members, Police, Fire and Active Duty or Retired Military!
name: Lore Brewing Company

description: You'll be greeted and seated within the stylish, elegant decor encompassing fine glass and woodwork chic furnishings, rich mahogany wood and oak arvhes salvaged from a historic St.Luis brothel pub.
name: Los Gatos Brewing Company

description:
Welcome to Los Muertos Brewing, Puerto Vallarta’s first craft brewery! Located in the heart of Old Town, Los Muertos Brewing is an authentic, cantina style brew-pub serving a variety of artisanal beers including IPA, malty ambers, stouts, and even fruit infused ales!

Los Muertos Restaurant, located directly above the brew-pub, specializes in New-York style pizzas as well as other pub favorites. Learn more 

Located just three blocks from the beach and surrounded by some of PV’s best bars, restaurants, nightclubs, and coffee shops, taste-testing the latest creations at Los Muertos Brew-Pub is the perfect way to start an evening in Old Town Vallarta!
name: Los Muertos

description: Brewing our own Beer will be a staple here at Los Oasis. Head Brewmaster Mike Kasian has plans of producing Latin Lagers and Ales which are inspired by some of Mexico's and South America's favorites. There will be 5 house brews on tap as well as a wide variety of wines from Spain , Chile, and Argentina.
name: Los Oasis Latin Grill & Cerveceria

description: A Craft MicroBrewery Rooted in Arkansas
name: Lost 40 Brewing

description: Founded in 1989 by Barbara Groom, the Lost Coast Brewery is one of the only female-owned and operated breweries in the U.S. Lost Coast is famous for its delicious and award-winning beers: Great White, Downtown Brown, Indica IPA & Tangerine Wheat!
name: Lost Coast Brewery

description: Fort Madison is one of the few places where the river actually runs east to west instead of the normal north to south. Many waterfowl follow the river on their migratory flights and they seemingly spend quite a lot of time circling in this area, as if confused over this natural phenomenon. Thus the name "The Lost Duck Brewing Company" was born. Take a tour of our website to find the current brews available, our pub-style foods and the events happening at the Duck.
name: Lost Duck Brewing Company

description: Belgium's oldest tradition comes to Colfax!
name: Lost Highway Brewing Company

description:
Our tasting room and production facility are located within the old firehouse and municipal building on Main Street in Ovid. Our renovations have transformed the main floor into a tasting room with a gift shop featuring local and handmade gifts from the region, and bottles of local wines.
 Patrons can enjoy beers brewed in house, spirits produced on site, and select regional wines by the glass.
name: Lost Kingdom Brewery

description: We are located at 254 Wilkins St (Just off Route 100) in Morrisville, VT. Slightly off the beaten path, we are proud to offer some of the most finely crafted beers in the great state of Vermont. Pair any of our fine selections with any of the house made, locally sourced items off of our delicious menu and we have no doubt that you will leave satisfied!
name: Lost Nation Brewing

description: Authentic and Innovative Craft Brews, Wood Fired Pizza, and Local Foods. Opening Summer 2014 in downtown Boone, NC.
name: Lost Province Brewing Co

description:
Lost Rhino™ is a new craft brewery in Ashburn, VA with deep roots in Loudoun County. Brewers Matt Hagerman and Favio Garcia, formerly of Old Dominion, are back together and now creating some of the finest beers found in the local area!

The name Lost Rhino™ represents the strength and attitude of the rhinoceros. The five species of rhino each has its own distinct persona, ranging from laid back to aggressive. Our brews will also span a range of personalities from hoppy Pilsners to rich, malty IPAs.

"Rhino chasers" are big wave surfers on a continuous journey to find the next perfect wave. At Lost Rhino™, we are on a similar journey to create a continuing line of distinctive, enjoyable, memorable beers.
name: Lost Rhino Brewing Company

description:
The Lost River Brewing Company is an artisan craft brewery and pub located in the West Virginia Potomac Highlands.

We are excited to open in this historic building, which is over a century old. Built in 1885, the first floor originally hosted a Frye Dry Goods store and blacksmith shop. Legend has it the second floor saw the first meetings of the local Masons. The Steinway piano prominently displayed in the pub was originally brought into the building in 1899. It has never left the building, and is the same piano that was used during the early 20th century to accompany silent films. During our extensive renovations of the building, we elected to preserve the original walls of the first floor, to honor the history of this building and the Frye Brothers themselves, the original builders.

 
We are grateful for the opportunity to establish our business in historic Wardensville and proud to become a part of the local community.
 
We hope that our artisan craft ales and delicious old-fashioned foods will add a little something special to the unique flavor of the beautiful Potomac Highlands.
name: Lost River Brewing Company

description:
Lost Tribes Beverage was founded in 2009 with a passion for innovative and dedicated brewing. We look beyond contemporary trends and call upon the wisdom of ancient brewing cultures. We resurrect lost recipes with precision and expertise, using the same ingredients as our forgotten ancestors. We honor the Lost Tribes by reviving their culture and flavor.

For almost 8000 years mankind has been creating alcoholic brews to raise a glass to a higher power or enliven the power within. Exacting craftsmen would develop brewing into an art form, becoming professionals revered by the community and receiving divine privilege from popular spiritual deities. While the social stature of the brew master endures, many recipes and techniques have unfortunately been lost to history; and it was from the discovery of such a lost brew that Lost Tribes was born.

On our travels through the ancient lands of Western Asia, we met a small community that had walked from Ethiopia to Israel, bringing with them long-forgotten wisdom and tradition. Along with this they had brought the recipe of a forgotten brew called Tej - the fabled gift to King Solomon from the Queen of Sheba. Under instruction in her family kitchen, an elderly woman taught us the process of its brewing, sharing the long-preserved and refined heritage to exact the brew to perfection.

Alongside the Lost Tribes range of inspired traditional beers sits the signature series. Comprised of resurrected brews that were previously lost to time, the signature series embodies the values and flavors of historyʼs brewing pioneers. In this way we honor the lost tribes that have not had the chance to tell their story, and those who inspire us when they share theirs. Assemble your tribe, raise a glass, and tell your story.
name: Lost Tribes Beverage

description: We are a family-owned, small-batch nano-brewery in the Town of Leesburg, a short walk from the historical downtown area.
name: Loudoun Brewing Company

description: Louisville Mead Co. is a locally owned small-farm winery that produces several varieties honey-based alcoholic beverages known as mead.
name: Louisville Mead Co.

description:
Loveland Aleworks is an independent, family-owned brewery offering a selection of small batch handcrafted beers.

We are passionate about brewing ales that we, and our customers, believe in — quality ales, made well, using the best ingredients. A simple combination.

We don't limit ourselves to brewing a certain style of ale. We brew what we like, but we're sure to share the rewards.
name: Loveland Aleworks

description:
Low Brau LLC is a Washington, DC based nano brewery created by Steven Sorrell in response to the current American Craftbrewing atmosphere. After visting breweries around the world, Steven noticed a lack of crisp refreshing session style beers brewed here in the US, so in 2010, the seeds of Low Brau were planted. 

With a background in the food industry and many years of beer research, it was only natural for Steven to start brewing at home, and wasn't long before he started creating his own recipes. Now a year later, Low Brau continues to move forward, with plans to open it's doors within the District in the next year. 

Low Brau's beers are German inspired, following the guidelines set fourth by the Rheinheitsgebot Purity Law and high quality ingredients. Each beer is hand crafted and brewed in small batches to maintain quality over quantity. 

Low Brau strongly believes in "Embracing Simplicity".
name: Low Brau

description:
LowDown is the culmination of 20+ years of professional brewing experience. LowDown owners Scott and Phil have won numerous awards, including accolades from The Great American Beer Festival.  We don’t just stop at great beer, we serve great food too.  We only serve the best seasonal menu items with quality ingredients.

LowDown understands what it means to give back. We know that we reside in a neighborhood many people call home. Making our neigborhood and everything around it better is part of our mission.

From our casual environment to educating our staff, we're redefining the brewery experience. At LowDown we're passionate about quality beer, great and sustainable food, and making memories with good friends.
name: Lowdown Brewery + Kitchen
Löwenbrauerei Hall Fr. Ethard GmbH & Co. KG
Löwenbrauerei Otto Dold Inh. Johannes Dold

description:
We’re a beer company.
We got our start in Seattle making stuff in our basement and seeing what our friends thought of it. After a little trial and a lot of error, the beer started to taste pretty good.
name: Lowercase Brewing

description: Using an 8 barrel brewing system makes us one of the smallest production breweries in Minnesota.  We focus on providing constant innovation and imagination to the craft beer enthusiast. Having a small, flexible system allows LTD Brewing to challenge the taste-buds of people who dream for a great beer. We are not bound by a style of beer, ingredients or a predetermined idea of what a beer drinker would expect. We are committed to re-inventing the way beer is brewed and providing an experience, not a drink.
name: LTD Brewing Co.

description:
LTS Brewing Company is a small microbrewery located in Rochester, MN.

Founded in 2013 by avid home-brewer Brandon Schulz and business partner Jeff Werning, LTS Brewing is currently brewing up small batch ales and lagers.

The LTS Brewery will develop in stages: delivering beer to local establishments, opening a taproom and, eventually, adding a kitchen. We are now officially licensed to brew beer in the State of Minnesota, and we aim to be delivering to bars and restaurants soon. We are currently focused on the build-out of the tap room with plans to open this spring.

We are excited to take our craft to the next level!
name: LTS Brewing Company

description: Lucette is hand-crafted by guys and brought to life by the artistry of a woman. Don’t be offended or embarrassed by her voluptuous curves or stunning assets--she isn’t. Lucette is an image of revolution and evolution, much like experiencing a non-macro beer for the first time. And what’s more, she is created from the finest ingredients by the hands of our own brewers, at our own brewery, and not by some mysterious brewery far away from "home". In other words, she is not fake, diluted, or overproduced --she is 100% Lucette.
name: Lucette Brewing Company

description:
In July 2010, over a craft beer at a local restaurant, Eric Biermann and Jon Messier had a Lucid thought – “Let’s throw away the ties and the corporate ladders.  Let’s start a craft beer brewery!”  That Clarity in Thinking, led to the successful launch of Lucid Brewing.

In June of 2011, with a year of planning already completed, they realized jumping headfirst into the brewery was the only way they could make their dream a reality.  They quit their day jobs.  

With that leap of faith – and a ton of support from many friends and family – they started building their brewery from the ground up.  Through the sweltering heat of the 2011 summer, many friends labored side by side with Jon and Eric.  They did it all, start to finish, from digging trenches to assembling the last tank.  So of course they needed a refreshing and light drink to quench their thirst while they toiled away.  They found just the right recipe and brewed their first beer – AIR.  A beer made to get the job done.  Its slight citrus aroma and flavor, lower ABV and crisp dry finish made this their favorite “go to” beer.  

By October the brewery was complete and cooking.  And in the spirit of the season, Eric and Jon gave thanks to the Brew gods when they made their first deliveries to their first three customers the week of Thanksgiving… in Jon’s car.  Lucid was on its way!

Always keeping an eye on the demand for high quality while quickly catching the craft beer lover’s attention, Lucid assembled a team of dedicated employees and introduced brews to quench their customers’ demands.   AIR, DYNO, FOTO and DUO, along with seasonal and small-batch brews, are quickly becoming Minnesota favorites at local bars and restaurants.  

Great success has followed them after throwing away the daily grind for the daily brew.
name: Lucid Brewing

description:
After years of working a local brewpub and experimenting in the garage, three guys decided to take their know-how and passion for great beer and bottle it.

Lucky Bucket Brewing Company is Nebraska's newest craft brewery, growing almost as fast as we can brew it. Our first release, Pre-Prohibition style Lager, is getting some welcomed praise for representing the true character of beer, reminiscent of a time when beer actually had flavor. Keep an eye out for our latest releases including a very floral and flavorful American IPA and our first barrel-aged release, Certified Evil.
name: Lucky Bucket Brewing Company

description: Welcome to Lucky Girl Brewing Company, America’s Drinkable Craft Beer. We take pride in brewing great tasting beers for the people that we love to drink too. Classically crafted in our state-of-the-art brewing facility, Lucky Girl Brewing Company offers a full line of quality crafts year-round: IPA, Black Lager, Golden Lager, Pale Ale, and Wheat Ale. Lucky Girl also has a full calendar of seasonal beers including Chocolate Doppelbock, Milk Stout, Lemon Shandy, Pineapple IPA, Octoberfest, and Pumpkin Ale. We hope you’ll enjoy them all as much as we do. So grab a glass or a bottle of your favorite Lucky Girl beer, and give a toast to great beer, our heritage, and the never wavering spirit of the Red, White, and Blue.
name: Lucky Girl Brewing Company

description:
Living in Mississippi, the selection of beer has always been limited compared to the rest of the country – but that does not stop those of us who seek out the diverse supply of the world’s greatest beers. Some drive across state lines to acquire the finer choices at festivals and suppliers alike, while others exchange trades with those from other states in search of the locally forbidden. But for those who truly take matters into their own hands, homebrewing beer becomes the purest form of gratification.

Driven by an extreme passion for both innovation and beer, our Brewmaster took what was once just a dream and decided to create a beer that would not only break state laws but also help change the very same laws that Mississippi has let fall behind. For eight years, he brewed beers of many different styles as a hobby - and with each tasting that he would hold at his home, the crowds grew larger. Eventually, he would be convinced that this beer should be available to those patrons who also appreciate the finer beers of the world.

Lucky Town Brewing Company was founded on this very notion – to craft beers that break boundaries between the working men and women of Mississippi and their wish for locally produced premium beer. With that mission, Lucas Simmons decided to grant those wishes by sharing his passion for crafting beer in 2011.
name: Lucky Town Brewing Company

description: Local Flagstaff brewpub and Micobrewery featuring award winning ales and lagers. Full menu with lots of sandwiches and BBQ. Great dance floor for late nite.
name: Lumberyard Brewing Company

description: Lumina Brewing Company is dedicated to producing beer in small batches. We brew our beer right on premises. All of our beer is fresh with no preservatives. We specialize in brewing German and Bohemian Style Beer. We brew our European Style beer in accordance with the Bavarian Brewing Tradition of “Reinheitsgebot”, the German beer purity law of 1516. This means that nothing is added to the beer except yeast, hops, water and grain. All of our Bavarian Style Beer contains malt and hops from Germany. Our Brew masters have extensively traveled Germany and the Czech Republic and have visited many breweries to learn the art of old world style brewing.
name: Lumina Brewing Company

description: Fine hand-crafted beers created on-site by head brewer and Sheridan native, Seth Orr. Located at 201 Broadway!
name: Luminous Brewhouse

description: Small craft brewery opened Mid June, 2015.
name: Lumpy Ridge Brewery

description: We are fermented teas. Carbonated into a slightly sweet fusion which resembles that of champagne. Our nature is probiotic, aiding digestion and detoxification. The healthy yeast particles and cultures from which we are created can be consumed or strained. We are local, non-pasteurized, gluten free, raw, Ohio natives. Our bottles are conditioned. We are delicious.
name: Luna Kombucha

description: Lunacy Brewing Company is dedicated to bringing you the best quality and best tasting craft beers to your palate. We are crazy over beer, as crazy as a lunatic. With so many craft beers on the market today, you can bet that we have tried most of them. Some may call it indulgence, but we call it research. We are in the process of building our brewery and tasting room and we hope that you will be able to try our Lunacy IPA as well as some of our other craft beers soon. Keep visiting our website for more information.
name: Lunacy Brewing

description: Lupulin Brewing is dedicated to making unique beers with attention to quality and flavor.  The company philosophy is one of community involvement, access to the public, and a little splash of idiocracy along the way.  Whether you are a regular or a new comer, we thank you and hope you enjoy our beers.
name: Lupulin Brewing Co.

description:
Mark and Paul, cofounders of LynLake Brewery, met early in their careers while building the Norwest Center (now known as the Wells Fargo Center). The two worked closely together while this landmark Minneapolis high-rise was being constructed in the early 1980’s.

As they continued to collaborate on the construction of other high-rises in the Twin Cities, their friendship grew. Fast-forward a couple decades. The two of them were sitting around one night enjoying a few Surlys and had an idea to build something of their own. Not another high-rise. A brewery.

Instead of chalking up their dream to idle beer talk, they stubbornly persisted.

They quickly found a building with its own unique character that would be perfect for their brewery. They soon added Joel, their head brewer, to the team, who shared their passion for craft beer and had connections to both Mark and Paul (Mark and Joel grew up in Virginia, MN; Paul and Joel studied Construction Management at North Dakota State University). From that point on it was full steam ahead with a pilot brewing system, designing and constructing the space, licensing, branding the idea, and most importantly, crafting, sampling and building their roster of unique, well-crafted beers. 

Located in the historic Lyndale Theater in the LynLake neighborhood of Minneapolis, the brewery features a lineup of high-quality flagship craft beers along with seasonal rotations, specialties and the occasional one-off. Each is constructed to bring out the bold flavors and aromas of the high-quality ingredients and served up in a taproom with nearly 100 years of local history. And because there’s nothing better than beer and sunshine, there’s also a rooftop patio. It has ample space to relax, kick back with friends and build some crazy-ass, high-rising ideas of your own.
name: Lynlake Brewery

description:
You can call Lynnwood Grill "comfortable excitement.” It’s the kind of place where people know your name... and the bartenders know what you're drinking.

Now located across from the Raleigh Grande Theatre, this locally owned bar and grill is the perfect place to grab a bite before or after the movie. It’s also a cozy place to meet friends for drinks, watch a game, or listen to live music. When the weather is nice, enjoy drinking and dining on the outdoor patio or the spacious rooftop.
name: Lynnwood Brewing Concern

description: LyonSmith Brewing Co. operates in the amazing town of Penn Yan, NY. Our mission is to make beer that is worth drinking, a company that is worth working for, and a community that is worth living in.
name: LyonSmith Brewing Co.

description: M.I.A. is a production brewery located in Doral, Florida. We are inspired by our tropical environment and culture. We are dedicated to the production of the finest hand-crafted beer. Our brands are available throughout South Florida at local bars and restaurants.
name: M.I.A. Brewing Co.

description: Mac & Jack’s Brewing Company proudly dedicates itself to preserving a clean environment as a responsible resident in Redmond and to the community at large. From re-using water to providing spent grain to local farmers, all byproducts created here during the brewing process are recycled responsibly. This makes for happy neighbors as well as happy cows!
name: Mac & Jacks Brewing Company

description: Our goal at Macatawa Ale Company is to provide the area with another destination that will help expand the already predominate tourism market as well as contribute to Michigan’s growing authority in the micro-brewing industry. We will achieve this by using our experience in brewing, developing original recipes, and our overall passion for craft beers. The beers that we will release have been time tested on home-produced level and are ready to enter the market to be enjoyed by customers of all types! We aim to gain recognition as one of the premiere micro-brewing establishment in the Holland area, and perhaps even in Michigan.
name: Macatawa Ale Company

description: MacDowell Brew Kitchen, the newest nano brewery in the area, introducing the finest in craft beers that are brewed on premises under the direction of several master brewers.  MacDowell Brew Kitchen has some very special beers on draught and bottles brewed by other nano breweries, around 150 to choose from.  Our menu includes BBQ, American Cuisine, and other surprises!
name: MacDowell Brew Kitchen

description:
At Machine House Brewery, we produce traditional English style Ales in small batches at our historic location in Seattle's Georgetown neighborhood.

Our goal is to deliver the authentic session beer experience to Seattle, meaning particularly drinkable ales with moderate levels of alcohol and bitterness.
name: Machine House Brewery

description: Mackinaw Trail Brewing Company has established itself as a premier Microbrewery in the Northern Michigan Area. Currently including eight beers on tap and two hard ciders, plans to expand to twenty taps are already in motion.
