Whether you come to taste by the sample glass, pint, snifter, or take home a custom Yelper, Howler, or Growler, MTB should have something for everyone! Be on the look out for ‘Fudged Up’ stout in 22 oz crown cap Belgian bottles in early 2015.
name: Mackinaw Trail Brewing Company

description: This craft brewery is famous for its signature MacLean's Pale Ale. MacLean's brews with a unique combination of British malts, English Fuggles and Goldings hops. Add to that a distinctive strain of English ale yeast and the result is a well hopped, malty ale with a fine balance and flavour.
name: MacLean's Ales

description: Come enjoy a pint of traditional British ale, brewed fresh right here in Van Nuys!
name: MacLeod Ale Brewing Co.

description: Macon Beer Company, LLC is a craft beer company focused on innovation, sustainability, philanthropy, and developing a strong connection to our employees and community. We expect to maximize profitability without sacrificing quality, purity, or attention to detail through the use of engineering principles that improve value and efficiency beyond industry standards. We will strive to become a source of knowledge held in high regard by the craft beer industry. In addition, Macon Beer Company will become a respected business in the Macon area via investment in the community and promotion of an inviting and supportive business personality.
name: Macon Beer Company

description: Looking for the best beer in town? Look no further my friend, Mad Anthony’s Brewery has got you covered. Grab a pint of our award-winning hand-crafted ales or lagers and kick back in one of our three locations. A cool, laid back atmosphere, full food menu, weekly live music, and of course an ever-changing menu of awesome beer is always in full swing. We offer one of the area’s best deep dish Chicago style pizzas, a variety of vegetarian selections, our now famous "Unwraps" and traditional pub fare. Whether you want something light, or are ready for a full meal, or need catering services for your next gathering, let us show you why Mad Anthony’s Brewery should be at the top of your list for fun!
name: Mad Anthony Brewing

description: Setting itself as the premiere craft brewing company on the beach, Madeira Beach Craft Brewing Company (MBCBC) manufactures a whole host of craft brews from IPAs to Ales to seasonal specialties.  With an opening set for the fall of 2013, MBCBC is sure to leave a lasting impression on your vacation!
name: Mad Beach Craft Brewing Company

description:
We are a craft brewery in Hayden, Idaho. Follow us for updates and promotions for our fall opening!!!

Inspired and financed by United States Army Explosive Ordnance Disposal Technicians (Bomb Squad), the Mad Bomber Brewing Company will offer a solid lineup of assertive American Ales.
name: Mad Bomber Brewing Company

description:
Mad Fox Brewing Company offers a dining experience unique to the Washington, DC, area: upscale casual dining in an English-style gastro brewpub with an emphasis on high-quality food to complement our house-brewed beers.

Mad Fox features a chef-driven, seasonal menu and frequent specials including pizza, panini, salads and vegetarian friendly foods; fresh, locally grown seasonal produce, cheeses and other ingredients; locally raised lamb, bison, beef, chicken and game; and house-cured meats.

Mad Fox has a 63-foot long bar showcasing our seven to ten standard, house-brewed beers on tap as well as a rotating selection of seasonal brews in German, English, Belgian and American styles. Also, don’t miss our cask conditioned proper Real Ales served through water jacketed Angram beer engines, ensuring that every pint is served at properly conditioned cellar temperatures.
name: Mad Fox Brewing Company

description: There is an old saying that ‘it takes a lot of beer to make great wines…’  Well, we can attest to it!  After nearly 25 years of home brewing to quench our thirst we decided to go-pro. The stack of recipes are too many to count. These recipes and their styling are often layered with a culinary perspective along with visions of a cold frothy beer at the end of a long day making wine. In 2012 we began to turn this passion into a reality.  We reached out to the community around us, the barrel suppliers, equipment manufacturers and our local farmers to literally test the waters.  We pulled barrels and equipment from our wineries and began building a custom brewing system (2 beer barrel system).  In 2014 we found a small space in St Helena, received a use permit and began creating our beers in July of this year…Wow! How did that happen? A lot of sweat, determination and of course help from our family, friends and colleagues…Did I say wine! Yes, it’s only fitting that ‘it takes a lot of wine to make great beer!”
name: Mad Fritz

description:
Mad Hatter Brew Pub is the perfect spot for you to meet up with your friends and sample some local craft brews and grab a bite to eat. Located in Downtown Tempe, Mad Hatter is conveniently located across the street from the Veteran’s Way Light Rail Stop and Sun Devil Stadium.

Come on in say hello, grab some food and a beer and make yourself at home at the best brew pub in Tempe.
name: Mad Hatter Brew Pub

description: Craft-Brewery serving their own beer, root, birch beer, food and local wine. Live music on weekends.
name: Mad Horse Brewpub

description:
MAD JACK BREWING CO.
The Van Dyck Lounge is proud to announce the recreation of the historic brewery that was once the center of Schenectady. Named after John (Jack) McDonald, Mad Jack Brewing Company is a collection of unique beers that each have their own personality and flavor. The same McDonald family that has brought you other unique establishments in the area, Pinhead Susan's, The Van Dyck Lounge and The Stockade Inn, welcomes you to stop by and have a taste for yourself!
name: Mad Jack Brewing Co.

description: We began our hard cider production in a modest warehouse in 2014. We aspire for an artful production of fresh-pressed, hard apple cider. Crafted from locally grown apples; brewed in small unfiltered batches. Our goal is to produce amazing, creative flavors drawing inspiration from the craft beer revolution. We strive to support the local market by using Ohio apples and other local products.
name: Mad Moon Craft Cidery

description:
Mad River Brewing company is now in our third decade of operation and even now it is hard to think of what we do as a business and not as a hobby. Brewing is a passion here and we spend a great deal of our time trying to perfect the next great taste.
 
At Mad River Brewing company we pride ourselves on the fact we are still here because of you. Without your support and your love for our passion we would not have made it this far. We love to hear from you so if you have something you wish to say good or bad by all means send us an email.
name: Mad River Brewing Company

description:
Started by Denis Martin and Maxime Libouton, two young Belgian Brewers in love with beer and worshiping yeast along with all the good stuffs that go with it ! The accent is put on what we think Belgian beer is: tradition, well balanced,easy to drink but yet with a strong character. 
All this with the help of new hops and a hint of madness!
name: Mad Yeast
Madison Brewing Co, Pub and Restaurant

description:
Situated in Southwestern Montana’s Gallatin Valley, Belgrade (home to Madison River Brewing Company) is an outdoorsman’s paradise.  Within an hour, one can be skiing or biking in the Bridger Mountains or Big Sky area, enjoying a hike in one of seven mountain ranges, or fishing world-class rivers.  The latter is where our name originated. 

The Madison River has earned the reputation as one of the best places to fly-fish in the world.  Because the river is located in our backyard, current Brewmaster/President, Howard McMurry chose Madison River for the name of our world-class brewery.  Sticking with the theme, most MRBC beers carry the name of a fishing fly.

Madison River Brewing Company, Inc. started in 2004 when Howard purchased the brewery and equipment from Moab Brewing.  At that time, we contract-brewed for Moab, Park City, and Big Hole breweries. In 2005, Madison River Brewing Company emerged when we received a state license to brew our own brands.
name: Madison River Brewing Co

description:
MadTree Brewing Company was started by three self-proclaimed “maniac” homebrewers and aspiring entrepreneurs who believe strongly in the creation of beers that stand up to the best craft brews across the country.
Along with that vision they put their own “mad twists” on their creations. The MadTree approach is simple – create high quality beer, educate the consumer, run a responsible business, and support the local communities.
MadTree engages local artists and craftspeople for their marketing materials, can designs, tap handles and furniture. Many of these efforts have received local and national recognition.

HIGHLIGHTS
- The trio quit their corporate jobs in 2012/2013 and in January 2013 they brewed their first commercial batch.
- In April they opened their taproom and became the first modern craft brewery to can their beer in the state of Ohio.
- Draft Magazine rated PsycHOPathy IPA a 97/100, the second best score for an IPA reviewed by Draft Magazine.
- PsycHOPathy IPA was named as one of the “Six New Craft Can Designs That Belong in an Art Gallery” by craftcans.com
name: MadTree Brewing Company

description:
Maeloc is deeply committed to the Galician countryside where its ciders are brewed with 100% Galician apples from more than 1000 local farmers. Galician apples: Raxó, Príncipe, Peró, Rabiosa and Verdeñ´.

Our cider is made the traditional war with no added sugar froma fresh apple must and not from concentrate.

Owned by Hijos de Rivera S.A.U. (Estrella Galicia)
name: MAELOC

description: The Saturnalian Saga of Magic Hat began in 1994 when our first batch of beer was brewed in a funky little space on Flynn Avenue, in Burlington, Vermont.  Dozens of beers and a brewery later, the Vermont brewery finds itself reaching more than 30 states with its unique take on classic styles.  Magic Hat continues to be a leader in craft beer and is currently the only craft brewer putting a performance in every bottle.
name: Magic Hat Brewing Company

description:
Who are Magic Rock?
Nestled in the industrial Pennine town of Huddersfield lies one the UK’s most exciting and modern craft breweries.  Consistently up there on the rating sites, Magic Rock have brought US inspired beers to the heart of Yorkshire’s brewing tradition.
An ambitious brewery, this year has been big for them picking up a Gold for Salty Kiss in the prestigious Beer World Cup.  They also joined a growing number of UK breweries represented at the Mikkeller run Copenhagen Beer Celebration, an invite for any brewery to celebrate receiving.
 
Why we invited Magic Rock…
They are one of the most exciting and consistently superb breweries in the country.  This year’s Un-human Cannonball, a continuation of their Cannonball IPAs, was something to behold.  Last year they sent down their hallucinogenic six-shooter of a festival bar to LCBF 13, head brewer Stuart painted his beard blue and red and they served up an amazing array of beers, including Beer World Cup winner, Salty Kiss.  This year, expect Yorkshire’s finest to craft flavour and fun into some of the best beer you’ll try this summer.
name: Magic Rock Brewing

description: Magnetic Brewing is a San Diego Craft Nano Brewery specializing in high gravity beers brewed with quality hops, barley, malts and ajuncts.
name: Magnetic Brewing

description: Brewery and gastropub in San Francisco's Haight Ashbury District with a new production brewery and BBQ restaurant, Smokestack,now open in the Dogpatch neighborhood.
name: Magnolia Brewing Company

description: Our signature offerings are classic hard ciders crafted in the farmhouse tradition of southwestern England like their Scrumpy, Somerset Cider, Bitter Love, Lake Pepin, Kingston Black, and their most recent release, Honeycrisp Hard apple cider.
name: Maiden Rock Winery & Cidery
Maihama Beer Koubou Harvestmoon Brewery At Roti's House

description: Our Brew pub can seat around 150 people. We have a full bar with nine beers micro brews on tap, we also serve some domestic beer as well as some local wine. We have a down stairs game room with pool tables, foosball table, air hockey and a couple arcade games. We open at 11:00 A.M. Daily for lunch and we start serving dinner at 3:30 P.M. Until 10:00 p.m. then it's pizza in the bar! Come in on Sundays and watch the football games and other available sporting events!
name: Main Street Brewery

description:
At 4204 Main Street Brewing Company we believe simple and amazing food and beer pairing is a staple in life and we wanted to share that. Our neighborhood restaurant and brewery is a place to meet, experience amazing food, carefully brewed local beer and to enjoy life. Whether you love food or you love beer you’ve come to the right place. We are here for the food and beer lovers just like us.
 
We have a unique atmosphere at Main Street and a menu that compliments our beers. From light and sweet to heavy and bitter, you can find a beer here that suits your taste. Come in and enjoy one of these locally crafted beers. Keep coming back to find out about our latest beers and menu items.
 
Our outside patio is dog friendly!
name: Main Street Brewing

description: To us at the Main Street Grille and Brewing Co. this is not just what we offer but this is who we are and what we do. Offering exceptional service accompanied with great food and hand crafted beers at a customer conscious price, which is our main goal. We pride ourselves on only using the finest and freshest ingredients from our menu to our beer list. This is what sets us apart from most other companies. We understand that we only have one shot to make a customer happy and gain their repeat patronage, this is why we go the extra step every day. Be it a special meal request or holding a favorite table to just remembering a guest name. These are again the things that set us apart from companies that lose sight of hospitality and only give customer service.
name: Main Street Grille and Brewing Company
Main Street Station Casino, Brewery and Hotel

description:
Maine Beer Company is a very small micro brewery located in Portland, Maine.  We don’t concentrate on any particular style of beer.  We don’t do just  big beers or small beers or light beers or dark beers. 

Our production is limited and our process is slow (our beers are 100% bottle conditioned) but our dedication to brewing really good beer and doing what’s right always comes first.
name: Maine Beer Company

description: Jack Russell's Steak House & Brewery is located at 102 Eden Street in Bar Harbor. It is open year round and produces draft and bottled beers under both the Jack Russell's and Maine Coast Brewing trademarks. Tours are offered in season.
name: Maine Coast Brewing Company

description:
The Mainspring Brewery and Alehouse will be an inviting craft brewery and full service restaurant, where friends, families and business associates can break bread, share conversation and enjoy a fresh, delicious locally-produced beer. 

Our target opening is Spring 2012. We are currently exploring a number of sites within the village of Hamburg, NY. For updates on our status, please visit our blog, and subscribe to our RSS feed (buttons to the right). 

It is our vision to become a center of community pride as well as a popular destination for good food and drink.
name: Mainspring Brewery & Ale House

description:
Maisel & Friends is one of the principal pioneers of the German craft beer market and also internationally recognized.

We have a large part in that beer has again the importance that it deserves.

The Maisel & Friends beers are an integral part in the craft beer shelf and the well-stocked beer card.
name: Maisel & Friends

description:
Grahamstown Brewery Pty (Ltd), trading as Makana Meadery was founded in the year 2000 with the primary objective of placing a 20 000 year old South African honey based beverage, iQhilika on the world's shelves.

Makana Meadery has its beginnings in a Rhodes University based research project to develop state of the art fermentation technology for producing iQhilika, an African mead. The meadery is housed in a historical Grahamstown landmark on the outskirts of this picturesque educational town in the Eastern Cape of South Africa.
name: Makana Meadery

description: Malka beers undergo two natural fermentations: the first in the fermentation vat and the second within the kegs and bottles themselves. This second fermentation contributes to the development of the beers’ unique taste and their complexity as time goes by. In addition, the second fermentation provides the beers’ gentle carbonation.
name: Malka

description: Malmö Brygghus is the only local micro brewery in Malmö. Since the opening in November 2010, Wit, Pale Ale, Pilsner, India Pale Ale and Cocoa-Porter are always available on tap, directly from the brewery. Every month, a monthly special beer is presented from a guest brewers or a special recipe with the beer enthusiasts in mind. You will find them at the top of Öl ~ Månadsöl and Gästbrygd.
name: Malmö Brygghus

description: Malty Dog Brewery & Supplies is a microbrewery, winery and homebrew store. Come have a pint or a glass of wine while enjoying the relaxed setting at our bar. If any of our beer or wine strikes your fancy, we'll give you the recipe and show you how to make it at home. So come shop, relax and enjoy. We also have free WiFi!
name: Malty Dog Brewery & Supplies

description: Mammoth Brewing Co. has been brewing award-winning beers since 1995. We brew in the Whiskey Creek building, but our Tasting Room is about 2 blocks away at 94 Berner Street, behind the Village's parking lot in the second white building. Open daily 10am - 6pm.
name: Mammoth Brewing Company

description: Three friends turned a renovated pole building in Syracuse, Indiana, into a guys retreat. A perfect hangout to relieve the daily stress with no work, no worries, and of course no women!
name: Man Cave Brewing Company

description:
During the 1800's and into the 20th century, Manayunk was known for the manufacture and sales of fine textiles. Krook's Mill, now the Manayunk Brewery and Restaurant, was one of the linchpins of the then booming industry. Anne Dawson opened the mill in 1822 at the mouth of the Manayunk Canal and the Krook family followed with the existing building just short of 100 years later in 1912. A cornerstone from the original mill was placed in the new building. Krook's Mill eventually closed its doors in 1992.

Four years later, Harry Renner IV brought the facility back to life as a space for retail business, a fine eatery, a brewery and as an entertainment complex for both neighbors and visitors alike to enjoy. Our first batch of fresh-brewed beer was tapped on October 17, 1996. In 2000, we expanded our outdoor seating with a deck overlooking the Schuylkill River. In 2003, we added a Stone Pizza Oven and a Sushi Bar to expand our menu selection. Today you can still find the scale, now an antique, that was once used to weigh the wool brought into the factory.
name: Manayunk Brewery and Restaurant

description: Manhattan Beach Brewing is no longer brewing beer.
name: Manhattan Beach Brewing

description: MBC offers a wide variety of beer styles brewed on location and also craft beer from our favorite breweries around the world. While we offer a few flagship brews year round, our tap selection generally varies from week to week, and of course season to season. If you don’t see your favorite style, stop by and let us know what YOU would like to see us brew…If you ask for it, we will brew it!
name: Manitou Brewing Company

description: Our goal is to bring craft brewing to Mankato Minnesota. Brewing great beer consistently and with the highest quality. Our plans are to have the brewery ready for production in the fall of 2011.
name: Mankato Brewery

description: Family-Owned, Farm Brewed.
name: Manor Hill brewing

description:
Historically, beer has been brewed on premise at Manorhouses because it was difficult to transport. This led to a great diversity of beer in both taste and style. Manorhouses brewed to seasons and used beer as both sustenance and social lubricant. Manorhouses and the beer they produced were unique to families and the communities of which they were a part. We will fulfill all those same criteria. 

Manor House Brewing represents an alternative to conventional beer, we are prideful in our local roots and want to inspire pride in our local community. Our beer is an output of a thoughtful creative process and we view what we do as art, not commodity. We experiment with new things, but try to predict the outcome in advance. Every so often, we accidentally stumble upon greatness.

Why do we want to brew beer? To satisfy a longing for the simple pleasures and a simpler time. Happiness, joy, and relaxation is our goal.

How are we different from every other craft brewer? The very same thing that makes us the same. We are creative, innovative and different. We do not feel compelled to brew to style as we may create our own, but when we do brew to style, we do so with passion.
name: Manor House Brewing

description: Family owned and operated micro-brewery in Grover Beach.
name: ManRock Brewing Company

description:
Our mission is simple: craft and drink great beer.  Through hard work, enthusiasm, and passion we hope to enhance your journey. Map Brewing Company… You are here!
MAP Brewing Company focuses on delivering fresh, local, and high quality Montana beer served in a warm, friendly, and comfortable atmosphere.  Great craft beer, good times, and great community are the cornerstone of it all. Whether you ski, bike, fish, hunt, or just walk the dog…the MAP Room is a perfect place to unwind and enjoy unparalleled views of the mountains while sipping on a fresh MAP Beer!
name: MAP Brewing Co.

description: Marble Brewery is located in the heart of Downtown Albuquerque.  Marble is a hub for local lovers of craft beer, community, music, food, and fun.  We offer bold, award-winning, locally brewed craft beer in a lively pub setting.
name: Marble Brewery

description: A general's prized mare and a shipwreck. A naval shipyard founded in 1854. Forty thousand welders, torpedo makers, radiomen and Rosie the Riveters securing our freedom through a Civil, a Cold, and two World Wars. Two winemakers now toiling to handcraft beer worthy of this historic island. Come visit our taps at the northern waterfront of the San Francisco Bay.
name: Mare Island Brewing Co.

description:
Marin Brewing Co., Marin county's first brewpub, opened 
April 1,1989. The general partner of Marin Brewing Company is Brendan Moylan, Brewmaster and Restaurateur. Much of the Restaurant's character and success can be attributed to Brendan's late partner Craig Tasley.

Marin Brewing Company is located at 1809 Larkspur Landing Circle, in the Larkspur Landing Shopping Center in Larkspur, California, 94939.
name: Marin Brewing Company

description:
"The Adventure Starts Here."

Brewer of small batch hand-crafted ales.

Mission - Mariner Brewing Company pledges to continually endeavor to brew finely crafted beer, while forever maintaining a strong sense of fun and adventure.
name: Mariner Brewing Company

description: Maritime Pacific Brewing Company is our small, family-owned brewery, established in 1990. As traditional home port to Northwest mariners, the Ballard district of Seattle provides us the perfect setting for a brewery with a seafaring name and tall ship as its emblem. With its full-rigged white clipper ship set against dramatic Olympic Mountains, the Maritime Pacific logo recalls days past when fast windships once plied these Puget Sound waters laden with cargo for trade in exotic ports-of-call. To please the descendants of those bygone sailors in whom the taste for fine local beer lives on, and to salute Seattle's seafaring history, the Maritime Pacific Brewing Company was created
name: Maritime Pacific Brewing

description:
Given Hannibal's history we have lots of fun branding our beers and special events. 

Our craft beers range from Cardinal Red Ale to Huck's Habenero Wheat, Mark Twain's Blonde and several  in between.
name: Mark Twain Brewing Company

description: Market Garden Brewery & Distillery. The love is coming from the same folks who brought McNulty's Bier Markt, Bar Cento and Speakeasy to Ohio City
name: Market Garden Brewery

description: Market Street Brewing Co. & Restaurant was founded in June of 1997 by Theresa and Pelham McClellan. Located on historic Market Street in downtown Corning, NY the brewpub embodies the essence of the  microbrew revolution. With six fresh beers brewed right on premise, and delectable “upscale” menu, Market Street Brewing Co. & Restaurant provides only the finest food and drink to our estimable patrons. Open seven days a week with rooftop seating and a bier-garten to compliment our dining room, bring the family and enjoy Corning’s first brewpub.
name: Market Street Brewing Company

description: Marley's opened in February of 2011, in Bloomsburg, PA.  They have up to 10 different styles on tap, with an American Style Pub Cuisine.  Come check out the nice interior and pet friendly patio.
name: Marley's Brewery and Grille

description: Marshall Brewing Company’s goal is to bring the art, quality, and enjoyment of craft brewing to Oklahoma. MBC does this by operating with a highly trained and educated staff that possesses a passion for top quality brewing and will settle for nothing less. The company aims to be known as the premiere brewery in Oklahoma and to be respected on the regional and national markets as well. MBC’s development goals are for steady growth without ever sacrificing quality, which is the cornerstone of the product line.
name: Marshall Brewing Company

description:
We have 17 draft lines dedicated to our beers. Some beers are brewed seasonally, but we try to keep different brews coming in all the time.

Marshall Wharf is the house brewery for Three Tides.
name: Marshall Wharf Brewing Company

description:
Marston's Brewery owns over 2,000 public houses in the United Kingdom and is the world's largest brewer of cask ale.

Marston's Beer Company is the brewing division of Marston's PLC, operating the perfect blend of traditional heritage & contemporary breweries, crafting a portfolio of cask beers with appeal for all types of drinkers, suiting different occasions and the perfect accompaniment to all types of food dishes.
name: Marston's Beer Company

description: A unique downtown Nashua destination, we offer an eclectic mix of the old and the new. From the old-world charm of our decor to our amazing confectionery delights at our candy shoppe, we've got something for everyone! We invite you to stop by! Once you've been to Martha's once, you'll be back.
name: Martha's Exchange Restaurant & Brewing Company

description: Martin City Brewing Company is Kansas City’s newest family owned restaurant and pub.  It sits nestled in Martin City, near the train tracks.  Martin City Brewing Company has a one of a kind food menu with top-notch chefs on staff.  There are over 50 different brews to choose from.  Not only will one find a cozy space inside the pub, but one can enjoy the beer garden and live music on any given weekend night.  With chain restaurants taking over the American landscape, this restaurant/tavern is a great escape from “the norm.”  The newly remodeled hundred-year-old building is far from your ordinary place next door.  Make Martin City Brewing Company your next night out and your neighborhood hotspot!!
name: Martin City Brewing Company

description: Martin House Brewing Company is a team of brewers, explorers, and dreamers. We avoid tradition in favor of adventure both in brewing and in life. We value good ingredients and good people. Each of our beers pairs perfectly with the memorable moments in life. We want to be your hand-crafted beer of choice that's there with you and your friends whether you're celebrating your most recent adventure or planning the next one. Martin House - Made in Texas by Texans."
name: Martin House Brewing Company

description:
Im Spessart family brewery Martin is firmly rooted in Marktheidenfeld. The company is family owned and is celebrating its 130th anniversary in 2013.
Even when passing over the bridge over the Main to Marktheidenfeld each is clear: the Martinsbräu and the city Marktheidenfeld are closely related. Brewery and city for generations could provide an important impetus for the development of urban and rural areas.

Founded in 1883 by Henry and George Martin, sons of gypsum and oil Georg Müller David Martin, now heads Mary Martin as manager in the 4th generation of the brewery.

Beer has always played in the history of the city Marktheidenfeld an important place. Thus, the Martinsbräu evolved over the past 130 years extra initial five other breweries to a fixed size in terms of specialty beers.
Prudently, a keen awareness of the environment and a clear commitment to Spessart region describe the most excellent way of the brewery to a traditional economy size.

We call a friendly "Cheers" and look forward to be able to prepare you with our very high quality and award-winning drinks pleasure and enjoyment.
Originality is our unique beer before mixing trends in juvenile look.
. Under the umbrella brand Skt Martinus all varieties are: Pils and wheat exports over to the dark land of beer for fresh, palatable and genuine Franconian beer consumption.

That to remain, name guarantees Martin. Currently, with Mary Martin and the future certainly one of their three sons - because tradition obliges especially in a family brewery.
name: Martinsbräu

description: Marzoni's beers are brewed on premise, utilizing the finest ingredients available. Beers brewed at Marzoni's are dispensed directly from our chilled serving tanks to the tap stations on the bar for the freshest beer around! On any given day, there are at least 8 beers on tap, not to mention house-brewed root beer. Brewery tours are available!
name: Marzoni's Brick Oven & Brewing Co

description: Mash Brewing Co. is one of Western Australia's fastest growing Craft Breweries. From its original venue in the Swan Valley it now has a Brassiere in Bunbury and brassieres opening soon in Rockingham and two other Top Secret Locations.
name: Mash Brewing Co.

description: We are happy to bring a variety of consistently great ales and lagers to all of our neighbors in Central Indiana. Brewing and serving from our Greenwood tap room, we strive to provide high-quality and hand-crafted beers for everyone to enjoy.
name: Mashcraft  Brewing

description:
Jim Woods (artistic rendering left) is an avid yerba mate drinker. When not lounging around in his flowing camisa roja and matching gorra, he enjoys brewing flavorful craft beers and drinking them responsibly.

It was his love for hoppy beers and yerba mate coupled with his thirst for adventure, as evidenced by his ambitious patillas, that led him to discover MateVeza.

One day while partaking in an afternoon mate, he cracked open a pale ale that had a prominent flavor and aroma of cascade hops. Chispas flew as the flavors of yerba mate and cascade hops frolicked on his lengua, and the original perky pale ale was born.
name: Mateveza Yerba Mate Ale

description:
Starting life in 1984 as a company called “Brewtech” (very 80s) Matilda Bay Brewing Company was established by a group of local entrepreneurs all in their mid-twenties and all dissatisfied with the one-dimensional beer on offer in Australia.  They purchased a small pub called the Freemasons Hotel in Fremantle, Western Australia, installed a brewery and reopened as the Sail & Anchor Hotel. The brewery at the pub enabled the guys to control the quality and presentation of the beers and talk directly to the growing legions of converts.

 
Soon after this the rapidly expanding outfit acquired a property in Nedlands and opened as the Matilda Bay Brewery, producing its main brands Redback & Dogbolter as well as a raft of other specialty craft beers. At the same time the group had an expanding portfolio of hotels including the ‘Port Melbourne Brewing Co’ operating as the Redback Hotel in Flemington Road, North Melbourne.
 
In 1988 the Brewery again moved to bigger premises, an old renovated Ford factory in Stirling Highway, North Fremantle to continue to cater to the growing demand for Matilda Bay beers. In the early 90s Matilda Bay Brewing Company became a part of the CUB family – an arrangement that would see the beers reach truly national distribution.
 
In 2007 we relocated to the vibrant craft beer scene in Victoria, and continued brewing first in Dandenong and most recently at an old renovated Cadbury’s chocolate factory in Bertie St Port Melbourne, which includes a bar & restaurant – so we can again talk directly to our beer lovers.
 
Throughout the years we’ve produced some of Australia’s favourite specialty beers & ciders, and along the way bagged a swag of trophies and awards. Our highly regarded Head Brewer – Scott Vincent – leads our brewing team with pride as they continue on the mission established in 1984 at the Sail & Anchor Hotel.
name: Matilda Bay Brewing Company

description: Maui Brewing Co., with a brewpub in Kahana and production brewery in Kihei, has built a reputation for creating handcrafted beers brewed using the finest natural ingredients.  We have become one of the area's most popular dining locations and are Hawaii's largest craft brewery.  Our menu offers a broad selection of fine foods to satisfy any palate.
name: Maui Brewing Co.

description:
Established in 1995, the Maumee Bay Brewing Company brews and operates out of the historical Oliver House. Located at the corner of Broadway and Ottawa Streets it is the oldest working commercial building in Toledo. Our Brew Masters bring excellence in brewing and culinary experience to our craft beers. We transfer the same strength, creativeness, size, uniqueness and complexity of the architecture of the Oliver House to the artistry of our craft beer. No other brewery in the country brews under such history. With additional holding tanks and a bottling line located directly across the street at 28 Broadway, MBBCo's process requires great attention to detail and is very labor intensive. This delicate care sets our final product apart from other mass-produced brewing competitors.

Throughout the year we have 7 beers on tap at the Maumee Bay Brew Pub, including the historical Buckeye Beer. Additionally, our beers are available at all of the restaurants in the historic Oliver House. Come enjoy our craft beer paired with Toledo's best steak at Rockwell's or enjoy a pint with a pizza baked in our wood oven at the Pub. Enjoy a brewer's sample and some classic gaming at Mutz. It's simply a great place to be - in a whole lot of old and new ways! Our beer is also available for sale in half-gallon growlers "to go." We have twelve packs and kegs of Buckeye Beer available, plus kegs of select craft beers like Oktoberfest and Blitzen Ale seasonally.
name: Maumee Bay Brewing Company

description:
Max Lagers Wood-Fired Grill & Brewery Atlanta

Max Lager’s is the oldest independent brewery restaurant in Atlanta and is known widely for its wood-fired cuisine and freshly-brewed beers.

Located on Peachtree Street in the heart of Downtown Atlanta, Max Lager’s Wood-fired Grill & Brewery is an oasis of authenticity in an environment of national chains. The beautifully renovated 10,000 square-foot historic building features an industrial loft-style ambiance, and is designed to host fun events for groups of up to 700 people.

Max Lager’s was one of the first restaurants to bring the fresh and natural wood-fired menu concept to Atlanta. The art of cooking with wood enhances the Max Lager’s experience with bold flavors simply not found with alternative cooking methods. We feel that the investment made in the wood-fired grill is an investment that pays great dividends to our guests.
name: Max Lager's Wood-Fired Grill & Brewery

description:
Located in Tigard, you will find an atmosphere that is comfortable, friendly and casual. Max's Fanno Creek Brew Pub is child friendly and a fun destination for the entire family.

Our mouthwatering lunch and dinner menu selections are tasty and healthy. We use the best ingredients available, like wild-caught Mahi Mahi for our fish and chips, grass-fed, anti-biotic free beef for half pound burgers, natural, free-range chicken and trans-fat free vegetable oil. Plenty of favorites for the young ones are also available on our kid's menu.

Our craft beers are brewed right here, on-site, in Portland. Most of the beers from our brew pub are available in full kegs, pony kegs, and 5 gallon “corny” kegs. Max's Fanno Creek Brew Pub also offers some bottled beer, a full bar and Northwest wines. Our Hoppy Hour happens daily from 3 pm - 6 pm and 9 pm - close with drink and food specials. Max’s patio is the perfect place to enjoy a great lunch or beer in beautiful weather.

Our meeting room accommodates up to 50 people and is available to the community for private and public meetings, parties and gatherings.

Located in Tigard Oregon, our brew pub is just minutes away from Lake Oswego, Tualatin and Beaverton and well worth the drive from anywhere in the Portland area or Vancouver.
name: Max's Fanno Creek Brew Pub

description: Mayday Brewery opened 11/30/2012 in an abandoned blanket factory built in 1923. Mayday's 900 sq ft tasting room is the original boiler room for the blanket factory. Mayday has another 600 sq ft of bar area and a large outside deck. Mayday packages beer for distribution and their tasting room is open Thurs-Friday 4-8 and Saturday 1-8. Brewery tours are offered Saturday on the hour from 2:00-6:00. At Mayday our motto is, "We try NOT to suck."
name: Mayday Brewery

description: Mayflower Brewing Company is a craft beer microbrewery located in historic Plymouth, Massachusetts. Founded in 2007 by a tenth great grandson of John Alden, beer barrel cooper on board the Mayflower, we are dedicated to celebrating the history and legacy of the Pilgrims by creating unique, high-quality ales for the New England market.
name: Mayflower Brewing Company

description: Starkville, MS first brewery.
name: Mayhew Junction Brewing Company

description: We are a brewery in Corvallis, OR. We specialize in Belgian style beers made with the best ingredients the Northwest has to offer.
name: Mazama Brewing Company

description: Welcome to McCashin’s Brewery, home of New Zealand’s finest beverages. Our distinctive range of beverages is lovingly handcrafted from traditional recipes that have been the pride of the McCashin family for almost 30 years. We use only the finest natural ingredients, sourced mainly from the Nelson region of New Zealand, a region renowned for its organically rich soils and perfect climate. Our Palaeo water is amongst the purest in the world. And it is this water – along with our fresh, 100% pure ingredients – that give our beer, cider and spirits that uniquely refreshing flavour, which McCashin’s is famous for. Please take a tour of our website, and if you have any questions please contact us. We’d be delighted to hear from you.
name: McCashin's Brewery

description:
Over 10 house brewed beers on tap at any given time served with American Comfort food with a twist.

We have been making beer for over 17 years and are one of the most popular brew pubs in the Kansas City area.
name: McCoy's Public House and Brewkitchen

description: Independent Irish Beers brewed locally in Kildare. A great way to try flavourful craft beers. Irelands No. 1 Red Ale and Pilsner according to Untappd.com
name: McGargles Irish Family Brewers

description: McHale's Brewhouse is a Scotch-Irish Pub with an attached nanobrewery. We have amazing food. We make our own beer batter from our Dixie Blonde. We have 5-8 rotating house beers on tap at all times.
name: McHale's Brewhouse

description: McKenzie Brew House is a restaurant, brewery and night spot serving up fresh, upscale cuisine; creative, hand-crafted brews; and fun at its three PA locations!
name: McKenzie Brew House

description:
All of our beers are brewed in very small batches so they are always fresh and at their peak. Our brewers consistently bring home awards from the Great American Beer Festival, 24 medals so far. Our award-winning beers are brewed at all three locations, where our brewers strive to push the creative envelope.  Our beer selection is both consistent, with four flagship brands, and fresh with new offerings of seasonal and dark beers.

Unfortunately we can not go under the Steelhead name due to Trademark issues so we will be McKenzie Brewing Company.
name: McKenzie Brewing Company

description:
McKenzie’s Hard Cider was founded in 2011 by Lenny Ciolek in Buffalo, New York. Lenny played a crucial role in the success of the Mike’s Hard Lemonade brand and was able to secure distribution for McKenzie’s utilizing existing relationships and a grassroots method of marketing.

McKenzie’s currently produces 5 different varieties of hard cider; Original, Black Cherry, Green Apple, Seasonal Reserve (cinnamon and nutmeg) and Lazy Lemon (lemonade blend). Its varieties have received several awards including Double Gold Medal for Black Cherry, and Silver Medals for Original and Green Apple at the 2012 New York Wine & Food Classic.

McKenzie’s can be found at a bar near you, or at Wegmans and Tops grocery stores, where it is the best‐selling hard cider.
name: McKenzie's Hard Cider

description:
McLaren Vale Beer Company was founded by a couple of Craft Beer loving, proud South Australian mates, who enjoyed decades of heading down to the Vale from Adelaide for summer holidays and long weekends. Being lovers of great food and beverage and local produce, the rich tapestry of McLaren Vale always delivered. As the boys got to know the wine community and gained a deeper understanding of the region, they realised there was a tremendous opportunity for a beer producer to add another dimension to the local offering. Beer has long been a popular post-work refreshment for the wine community and we like to think that behind every great wine is great beer.
Us South Aussies are spoilt for choice when it comes to great food, beverage and produce. We have an appreciation for the good things in life, having grown up with such quality at our fingertips. This is the reason we started a beer company in this great state. We feel at home here and with that comes a responsibility to play a part in the great food and beverage offering.
name: McLaren Vale Beer Company

description:
Since our first brew at the Hillsdale Brewery & Public House in 1985, McMenamins has produced more than 57,600 batches. In 2011 our breweries collectively crafted 3302 batches of beer (including over 250 new and unusual house-specific recipes) more than 47,263 kegs of beer or an astounding 5.8 million pints!

In keeping with McMenamins' company philosophy, our breweries believe that brewing "green" is brewing responsibly.

Many beer lovers are familiar with our ales, such as Terminator Stout, Hammerhead, Ruby, Edgefield Wheat, Black Rabbit Porter, Sunflower IPA and others. Read more about these "standards" and dozens of others, including our beloved seasonal ales.

Due to the nature of handcrafting, it's safe to say that no two McMenamins batches are identical. Science and technology provide the backbone for our craft, but it is the unique qualities of each brew house, and the individual brewer's ale-crafting style, that ensure you will enjoy liquid refreshments that are truly special and made with every care for the environment. Cheers!
name: McMenamins Breweries

description:
Since 1992, McNeill’s brewery has consistently offered some of the Northeast’s finest beers. Brewmaster Ray McNeill has won accolades far and wide, including thirteen national and international awards.
Critics and food writers alike have praised McNeill’s products, including the Albany Times Union, “McNeill may be the best brewer in America,” or All About Beer Magazine, “The jewel in the crown of Vermont’s many fine beers.”
In 2008 McNeill opened the long rumored packaging facility just north of the venerable brewpub.
Today, McNeill’s packages ten different beers plus seasonals.
name: McNeill's Brewery

description: Packaging Brewpub in Sidney, Montana.
name: Meadowlark Brewing

description:
Based in Greenwich and fiercely proud of its London roots, Meantime has won a worldwide reputation for beers of great quality and provenance.

Meantime was the first British brewery to win any medals at the World Beer Cup in 2004 and is the only British brewery to have won medals at every World Beer Cup since. It was the first British brewery to produce a Fairtrade beer and is the only British brewey that can put a champagne cork in a beer bottle. It is also the sole beer supplier tot he Saisnbury's Taste the Difference Range.

Four of its beers were rated in the World Top 50 by the International Beer Challenge 2007 and 2008
name: Meantime Brewing Company Limited

description: Medieval Brewing Company offers handcrafted beers, ciders, mead and wine brewed in the fashion of Medieval Europe with a modern twist!
name: Medieval Brewing Company

description: We are a small contract brewer located in Gary, IN. We contract all of our brewing to City Brewing Co. in LaCrosse, WI.
name: Melanie Brewery Company

description: This is the home of The Melvin Brewing Company. We are beer lovers that specialize in IPAs, but believe in crafting the best beer in any style. Accept for you know, like German and English beers and whatnot. Ok, Europe in general we reckon.  We are located in Thai Me UP Restaurant in Hole, Wyoming
name: Melvin Brewing

description: Menace Brewing is a small craft brewery operating out of Ferndale, WA. We pride ourselves in producing high quality ales of wide varieties.
name: Menace Brewing

description: We take great pride in being pioneers in the American Craft Brewing Renaissance and even greater pride in our range of ales that beer lovers all over the country have made Legends.
name: Mendocino Brewing Company

description: Artisan crafted honey wines in Austin, Texas. Filling your glass with history in the New World.
name: Meridian Hive Meadery

description:
Six years ago I started making cider because of the lack of high quality products in the area, and now I have a product that everyone can be proud of. Mershon's Artisan Cider is made from only locally sourced fresh pressed apple blends and wildflower honey, free from any additives or concentrates. My name is Joseph Baird and I tender this premium product in honor of my family name that was lost, so raise a glass and enjoy. Cheers!
 
Taste the experience for yourself.
name: Mershon's  Cidery

description:
Born of a desire to see more beer produced by independent brewers in Ireland, Metalman Brewing is the brain-child of a couple of beer enthusiasts who were frustrated by the lack of availability and choice of flavoursome, authentically Irish beer. Inspired by some of the other small Irish brewers, they eventually decided to try and help do something about it.

Business plans were written, torn up, and written again. Locations were scouted, breweries were visited, and - of course - various different beers were sampled to ensure they were researching the correct product portfolio. Dirty job, but someone’s gotta do it.

Gráinne called time on her I.T. career in Jan 2011 to focus full-time on establishing the brewery, while Tim did the honourable thing and stayed put at the day-job to pay the bills. They started brewing their beer at a brewery in Templemore (White Gypsy) while planning the construction of their own brewery in Waterford. Their first beer, Metalman Pale Ale, went on sale in the first week of March 2011, and has been very well received. The brewery took somewhat longer than expected to get up and running, but production eventually moved to Waterford in May 2012.

The name of the brewery is inspired by a navigational aid on the Waterford coast. The figure of the Metal Man was erected in 1823 after a military transport ship called the Sea Horse was wrecked off the Tramore coast, resulting in a significant loss of life. The Metal Man stands on one of three pillars overlooking the bay, his purpose to guide seafarers, and keep them on their true course. We hope that our beers will do the same for you!
name: Metalman Brewing Co.

description:
Welcome to Metazoa Brewing Co. conveniently located near Fountain Square, we are making beer with a cause. We have decided that no less than 5% of our overall profits will go to various animal sanctuaries and foundations.

      All four members of our team are passionate about animals and beer. We hope to make Metazoa Brewing Co. a welcoming and educational place for everyone,  including the novice, expert, and animal lover.
name: Metazoa Brewing Co.

description: From day one, every drop of Metro beer has been brewed and packaged by us, in our warehouse production brewery in the Ravenswood Industrial Corridor of Chicago. We're proud Chicagoans, honored to be offering up fresh lagers to the Chicagoland area.
name: Metropolitan Brewing

description: A fast casual restaurant specializing in fresh food served fast. NOT fast food. All of our food is made fresh on premise. Our goal is to have you say "that was the best_______ I've ever had". Hope to feed you soon!
name: Mexitaly
Mia and Pia's Pizzeria and Brewhouse

description: Miami's first production brewery.  After years of hard work we've finally started our own brewery. Using Miami as our inspiration we challenge ourselves daily by unlocking new tasty combinations using fruits, spices, and herbs. Built from scratch using local ingredients.
name: Miami Brewing Company

description: The Michelob Brewing Co. is a small, state-of-the-art brewery where some of the world's most skilled brewmasters have access to anything they need to craft new beer recipes. Admittedly, not every experiment works. But then, you only ever drink our finest results.
name: Michelob Brewing Company

description: Michigan Beer Cellar is a microbrewery, small winery, and artisan distillery located in Sparta, MI.
name: Michigan Beer Cellar

description:
Michigan Brewing Company beers are hand-crafted with great care providing you with some of the smoothest, most well balanced beers money can buy.  

From our Wheatland Wheat Beer to our Superior Stout, most of our beers have won gold and first place awards around the country.  

Available throughout Michigan and surrounding states, look for MBC at your local bars, restaurants, and retail outlets.
name: Michigan Brewing Company

description: Normally anywhere from 6 to 11 different Finn's made beers, changing with the seasons. Oldest, biggest, and baddest brewpub in Lake County.
name: Mickey Finn's Brewery

description:
C'est au coeur de Baie-Saint-Paul, que sont brassées les bières d'inspiration belge "Dominus Vobiscum" Blanche, Ambrée, Double et Triple, ainsi que les bières "Vache Folle" ESB et Milk Stout.

Depuis maintenant 1998, les brasseurs charlevoisiens, ne cessent de laisser libre cours à leur imagination afin de satisfaire les amateurs les plus exigeants de bières spéciales. Depuis janvier 2009, les opérations ont été transférées dans de nouvelles installations plus modernes et plus efficaces permettant d’augmenter la capacité de production afin de mieux répondre à la demande.

Les produits de la MicroBrasserie sont disponibles dans les meilleurs restaurants, auberges et épiceries de la région de Charlevoix, ainsi que dans certains points de vente à travers le Québec.
name: MicroBrasserie Charlevoix

description:
In the charming surroundings of the Tremblant Ski Resort, at the foot of the slopes, we invite you to live a ‘devil-icious’ adventure at the Microbrewery La Diable!

Since December 1995, we have been welcoming adventurers galore who want to get to know our craft beers that are creating a stir in Québec. At your service, our friendly staffers are among the most congenial in the province’s brew pubs.

Whether it’s with friends, a group visit or just a taste in good company, the Microbrewery La Diable promises you an outing you’ll remember!
name: Microbrasserie La Diable

description: Located in Bromont, the homebrewed welcomes you in a warm atmosphere of camaraderie. You can enjoy our delicious microbrews, brewed by master brewer and owner, Patrick Dunnigan. His wife and co-owner, Diane Moreau, serves one of these delicious daily or map, available seven days a week the homebrewed, is the place to stop through Bromont.
name: Microbrasserie Le BroueMont

description:
Microbrasserie Pit Caribou is on a mission, since its inception 23 June 2007, to provide quality beers Gaspé leveraging its local resources. Having started small, the team now has a dozen employees and distributes its products in more than a thousand kilometers in the province.

Our beers brewed in Anse-à-Beaufils, a fishing harbor in the town of Perce, proudly bear names that refer to the Gaspé: The Blonde Anse, the Bonne Aventure Red, White 475 and Pratto Gaspé no.13. They are distributed to restaurants and even bartenders land of Gaspésie. You can also find their products in bottle 500 ml, 660ml or 1.9L our brewery shop and several grocery and convenience stores in Quebec.

The microbrewery is distinguished with several awards. The no.13 Gaspe won the silver medal in the Canadian competition "Canadian Brewing Awards" in the category in 2011 and bring the Pratto 475 Blanche was considered the second best white Quebec according to the magazine Protect yourself.  

With the Star Series brewer, a dozen other products have been marketed since 2012, positioning the company among specialty beers. "American Brown Ale" won the bronze medal in the "New York international beer competition" in 2013.

With the expansion of facilities and purchase of the building, the company has the wind in the sails!
name: Microbrasserie Pit Caribou

description: Step back in time to when men were men, women were brewsters, and hand-crafted fine ale filled every flagon. Your quest for great taste leads you out of the past and into Middle Ages Brewing Company where we are sworn to uphold the tradition of brewing beer in small batches. Taste the difference hand-crafting makes.
name: Middle Ages Brewing Company

description: Middleton Brewing is a small 1.5 barrel brew pub, located in south Everett.  It started as a hombrewers dream and through blood, sweat, and a lot of hard work and determination, was made a reality, by the Middleton family, in 2013.  Geoff Middleton, head brewer and owner, began creating his own ales in college and instantly fell in love with the brewing process and craft brew industry.  Middleton Brewing is family operated business, focusing community support, doing things right and supporting what we believe in.
name: Middleton Brewing

description: Middleton Brewing is a 10-barrel brewpub located in the heart of the Texas Hill Country.We special in Beglian and West Coast style ales.
name: Middleton Brewing

description: Midland Brewing Company is based out of Midland, Michigan. Our goal is to bring quality hand crafted beer to the greater Great Lakes Bay Region, through our on-site microbar, your local grocery store and through local restaurants and bars.
name: Midland Brewing Company

description:
Midnight Brewery is Metro Richmond’s newest micro brewery, located in Rockville, VA (just west of the city). We are extremely creative with our work and brew several limited edition beers. So stop in frequently; you never know what will be on tap.

We are family owned and operated; we answer to ourselves and ourselves alone. Craft brewing the best beers possible is our passion. We brew beers that we love, and we know you’ll love them as well. We’re proud to continue the great tradition of locally brewed Richmond beers. Be sure to come to the brewery, or stop in one of the stores or restaurants that serve Midnight. And check out our events page; you never know where we’ll pop up around town. You won’t be sorry.
name: Midnight Brewery

description:
Since firing up its brew kettle in 1995, Midnight Sun Brewing Company has become a serious yet creative force on the American brewing front. From concept to glass, Midnight Sun relies on an "art marries science" approach, mixing tradition with innovation, to design and craft bold, distinctive beers for Alaska...and beyond.

We at Midnight Sun find inspiration in the untamed spirit and rugged beauty of the Last Frontier and develop unique beers with equally appealing names and labels. But the company’s true focus remains in its dedication to producing consistently high-quality beers that provide exciting flavor and satisfying refreshment in all seasons.

From our extreme Pacific Northwest locale, we offer our wonderful beers on draft and in 22-ounce bottles throughout Alaska. Some of these beers are also distributed in Washington, Idaho, Oregon and California. We invite you to visit our hardworking brewery and retail Loft in South Anchorage every chance you get!
name: Midnight Sun Brewing Company

description: Micro brewery Midtfyns Brewery was founded in the fall of 2004, and the first beer was launched in March 2005. In the beginning  the beer was brewed under license from Scotland. When Eddie Szweda took over the management of the brewery in November 2006, he undertook radical changes for the small brewery in Brobyværk. Production was changed and a line of new and exciting beers developed by the brewery itself.
name: Midtfyns Bryghus

description: With our local roots, we take pride in our good relationships with local providers in the area.  Stop in for Locally Crafted Beers and more!
name: Midtown Brewing Company

description: Established in 2013, Mighty Mo Brewing Company is a brewery in the heart of Montana. Located in the middle of Downtown Great Falls, we intend to give downtown a much needed boost to revitalize the most under rated area in town. Our historic building was restored in recent years, providing a wow factor when you walk in the door, preparing you for the tasty brews you are about to indulge in! Mighty Mo has a full kitchen, offering pizza, wings, sandwiches, salads, and appetizers to go with your high quality, flavorful craft beer. We designed Mighty Mo Brewing Company to be a place where new and old friends can meet to enjoy quality beer, great food, and live music.
name: Mighty Mo Brewing Company

description: Migration Brewing caters to a diverse customer base who share a common love for quality beer drinking. In general our brew pub is geared to a creative and progressive crowd who enjoy a down-home drinking experience.
name: Migration Brewing Co

description: Mike Hess Brewing holds the distinction of being San Diego’s first licensed nano-brewery. Thoughtful branding, a great team and well crafted beers - most of which are now award-winning - led to growth into a beautiful, world-class brewery and tasting room in the heart of North Park, San Diego's most craft-centric and hippest neighborhood.Stop by our tasting room and taste it for yourselves. Great Beer. No Exceptions. No Excuses.
name: Mike Hess Brewing Co.
Mikes Hard Lemonade - Mark Anthony Group

description:
The story of Mikkeller is the story of two homebrewers that in a few years went from hobby brewing in the kitchen to national and international recognition.

Since the summer of 2007, Mikkel Borg Bjergsø, has run Mikkeller on his own. Mikkel is a gipsy-brewer, who brews at different breweries in Denmark, around Europe and the United States.
name: Mikkeller

description:
Producing five permanent naturally brewed beers, along with unique seasonal brews, from inside the former Astor Theatre in Mildura's restaurant precinct, the Mildura Brewery creates beers that are inspired by & named after local produce, landmarks & themes.
The unique Mildura Brewery has held on to its former glory as the Astor Theatre with a grandiose refurbishment of the magnificent art deco building, but also includes a state-of-the-art brewery that is on full display to patrons drinking or enjoying a meal in the brewery Pub. Out the back is more fermentation area & a modern bottling line capable of packaging 3000 bottles per hour
name: Mildura Brewing

description:
Welcome to Milepost 111 Brewing Company. We have a nano-brewery (very small).  We are slowly integrating our beers onto Milepost's tap lines!  It is a gamble if you are going to show up and be able to try one of our brews!  We are certainly going to work on it so we can consistently have something on tap. 

We also rent kegs and tap handles for your next function.  Please give us a call to reserve your next keg.
name: Milepost 111 Brewing Company

description:
Milkhouse Brewery at Stillpoint Farm is now open.  Visit us Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays. We offer handcrafted farmhouse ales made in small batches from hops and grains grown on the farm.  Check our web page and face book page for hours.

Check back in the coming months for our grand opening!
name: Milkhouse Brewery at Stillpoint Farm

description:
Milkman Brewing is a collection of local home brewers that found each other and decided to combine forces to offer locally made artisan beer for Pittsburgh and the surrounding areas!

Our goal is to become a licensed boutique brewery so we can make specialty local beer for private and public events.

We love that Pittsburgh is a city full of thriving small businesses, fantastic local eateries, and beautiful art. It is our hope to someday be known as one of the things that makes our city unique and wonderful!
name: Milkman Brewing

description: In a town said to have been built around beer, we are Jefferson County's first brewery to open in over 120 years. We have worked diligently, renovating and expanding our building into a new gathering place for our community. The brewery features a rustic family-friendly dining room and patio offering American pub food on the main floor as well as a second-story tasting room and bar complete with a deck. Open daily and pouring seven rotating handcrafted seasonal and year-round draft selections from our brewhouse.
name: Mill & Main Brewing Company

description:
Mill City Brew Werks is a small craft brewery and restaurant based in Camas Washington. As we are locally owned and operated it is our goal to support other businesses within Southwest Washington area and utilize local products and services to bring you what you are looking for, quality craft beer and great food!

We use only the finest hops and grains in every batch of Mill City Brew Werks beer and it is our goal to provide you, our family, friends, and neighbors, only the best tasting locally brewed beer. This we can promise not only because we are the owners of Mill City Brew Werks but more importantly because we love beer ourselves and are honored to produce it in the Great Northwest where beer is a time honored tradition and not a fad.

We thank you for your support and putting your faith — and taste buds — in our product.
name: Mill City Brew Werks

description:
The Mill House Brewing Company opened as a brewpub in November 2013, in the Historic Mill House that has, for many years, been a watering hole and restaurant for the citizens of Poughkeepsie and the surrounding areas. The rehabilitated 1820’s brick house is now home to a 7 Barrel single-infusion system, built by Portland Kettle Works, along side a restaurant that seats over 250+ guests. Mill House Brewing Company has long focused on creating Local Craft Beers, with World Class Flavor.  At MHBC, where art & science meet, it’s important to understand our humble beginnings. 
Jamie Bishop and Lawrence Stock, are Two best friends brewing better beer.  From the Days in the basement of Jamie’s Hudson Valley home, to brewing over 600 barrels in the first year at MHBC, the two have continually focused on creating beers that are not only seasonally varied, but have classic integrity. An American Brewers Guild graduate in 2014, Mill House Brewing Company continually strives to create better beer, with in-house lab testing, water recipes, and house yeast strain cultivation.  They are true masters of their craft, brewing 25 uniquely different beers to date, with many more on the way!
Mill House Brewing Company has enjoyed much success since 2013.  The Brewpub was awarded Top 100 Hot Spots in American from OpenTable dining, Hudson Valley Magazine Best New Restaurant and Bar Menu, Hudson River Craft Brew Fest “People’s Choice” in 2013/2014, as well as countless other accolades.  With the brewer owners, restaurateur partners Chris and Daniel Crocco, and boutique development firm RL Baxter Building, the team looks to spread their wings even more in 2015.  With a 20bbl brewhouse on the horizon this year, Mill House Brewing Company is dedicated to bringing Local Craft, and World Class Flavor to the world.  Prost!
name: Mill House Brewing Company

description: At Mill Street Brewery, we brew with the finest ingredients in small batches, yielding lagers and ales of exceptional quality and taste…and that’s no easy feat! Our dedication to our craft and passion for pushing the envelope has earned us some serious accolades since we officially opened in December 2002.
name: Mill Street Brewery

description: Mill Whistle Brewing is a one barrel brewery focused on exceptional craft beers despite our lack of sophistication. Mill Whistle Brewing is on the site of the 100 year old Safrit Lumber Mill. While this mill closed in the 70s the lumber yard next door is a viable operation. We have obtained the lovely steam whistle that announced lunch time in Beaufort every day for 100 years. Therefore, the brewery is named after this whistle. The brewery will be returning to the noon day whistle tradition.
name: Mill Whistle Brewing

description: Production Brewery.
name: Millersburg Brewing Company

description: MillKing It Productions (a.k.a…MIP) was founded in 2010 with a singular mission: To strip down all pretensions and preconceived notions of the craft brewing industry and create a truly memorable and focused catalog of fine beers. MIP does not have a sampling room or bar. We brew a limited number of stylistically and historically accurate beers. We will not jump from marketing wave to wave. We will not brew unbalanced fad beers. We will never put fruit, vegetables or other gimmicks into our beer. Finally, all beers will be packaged in draft, cask and what we see as the most responsible and best individual container…Aluminum Cans.
name: Millking It Productions

description: From Farm to Bottle; we source local raw honey, fruits and apples to handcraft intriguing ciders and meads.
name: Millstone Cellars

description: Pizza restaurant, Brewery, Sports Bar & Grill, Arcade, and Entertainment.
name: Millstone Pizza Company & Brewery

description:
Iowa's most award winning, oldest and largest microbrewery, located in the historic Amana Colonies.

To craft quality beer in the Midwest! Award-winning beers and sodas.
name: Millstream Brewing Company

description: Milly's Tavern first opened its doors in January of 2002 at the location of the former Stark Mill Brewery. Milly's opened through the hard work and love of the craft of Master Brewer Peter Telge, a New Hampshire native, who has been brewing his own beers for the better part of 20 years. With the closing of the Stark Mill Brewery and the many changes that have befell the city in the recent years, Peter felt that Manchester, as New Hampshire's Queen City, was sadly falling the way of commercial and contract beers. He, with a dedicated following of fans of his brew, set to work reopening the brewery as "Milly's Tavern," proudly operating as Manchester's only brew pub. We welcome you as our guests to stop by and try a glass of Peter's hard work.
name: Milly's Tavern

description:
The Milwaukee Brewing Company is the 'grown up' brewery name for the familiar Milwaukee Ale House in Milwaukee's Historic 3rd Ward.

The Ale House has always been brewing under the name Milwaukee Brewing Company. While we continue to brew at the Ale House, we have the 2nd Street Brewery located in Walkers Point.
name: Milwaukee Brewing Company

description: Our beers are all hand-crafted and have a unique personality to them that sets Mimbres Valley apart from other breweries. We use hops from all over the world and take great care in our selection of hops and grains.
name: Mimbres Valley Brewing Company

description:
Located in the heart of the Black Hills, and owned and operated by the same family behind the award-winning Prairie Berry Winery, Miner Brewing Company produces craft beers that are both traditional in nature, and yet truly “South Dakota”.

With five generations of family lineage handcrafting beverages in South Dakota, and with 15 years as winemaker and owner of Prairie Berry Winery, Brewmaster Sandi Vojta is inspired by the traditional brewing styles of her family’s European heritage. By infusing regional and seasonal ingredients into the recipes handed down to her, she has skillfully adapted those traditional styles to create craft beers with a regional character, setting each distinctly apart from other microbrews.

All of our beers are produced in small, 15-barrel fermenters, allowing us to keep each batch small enough to maintain microbrew quality and a close attention to detail at all times. The results are craft beers that are approachable and distinctive, to be enjoyed by craft beer novices and enthusiasts alike.

We invite you to experience Miner Brewing for yourself, as we open our Tap Room in Hill City this fall 2013. Stop on by for a flight or a glass, hang out to enjoy our seasonal selections, and stay a while for a little South Dakota hospitality. 

Join us in the Black Hills and discover your own pint of gold.
name: Miner Brewing Company

description: Minhas Craft Brewery is the 10th largest brewery in America. Located in the quaint Swiss town of Monroe in the southern tip of Wisconsin, a town famous for having the most specialty cheesemakers in America, the very famous 'Cheesedays' and of course, world class beers. The brewery has been located downtown since 1845. The brewery consists of 300,000 sqaure feet of heritage and brand new buildings spread over 7 acres of land in the heartland of America. We make all types of beer, ales and lagers. This includes American and Canadian Lagers, Pale Ale, Red Ale, Amber Ale, Bock, Farmhouse Ale, Hefeweizen, Dark, Light, Lager, Ice, Malt Liquours up to 13% alcohol by volume, Classic Pilsner, Euro Pilsner. Oktoberfest, Winter Ale, Lime ansd many more styles of beer. These beers are made with 2 row and 6 row malts and are handcrafted in small batches. We actually have 20 million pints of beer (equivalent) at different stages of finish at all times at the brewery. We also make old fashioned Blumers root beer and sodas. Although not our primary business, we also do contract packaging for Dixie, Berghoff, Kum and Go, Crunk, Atomic and various other companies.
name: Minhas Craft Brewery
Minipivovar Střední průmyslové školy potravinářské technologie

description: Brewpub featuring full flavored ales and lagers. In addition to brewery location we offer 2 offsite tap houses with full food menus (one also features 10 lanes of bowling). Company wide we offer house ales and lagers  with a rapidly rotating seasonal list.
name: Minneapolis Town Hall Brewery

description: Nestled in the heart of Northern Wisconsin’s lake country, the Minocqua Brewing Company is housed in an historic landmark building located on the island city’s north shore. Built in 1927 as a Masonic Temple, the building was transformed into a micro brewery and restaurant seventy years later. The brewery houses a seven and a half barrel system producing seven kinds of ales and lagers. The bar features a fine selection of wines, and cocktails, along with the skillfully crafted signature beer selections. The brewery's restaurant offers an interesting assortment of appetizers, sandwiches, soups, and salads with a gourmet twist.
name: Minocqua Brewing Company

description: Mispillion River Brewing aims to be recognized by its customers and the brewing industry for producing the highest quality craft beer. We honor craft brewing by using the highest quality malted barley and the freshest hops and strive for the best customer service in the industry.
name: Mispillion River Brewing

description:
Originally located less than a mile from the very hill where Friar Junipero Serra and his scurvy-ridden crew drove their stake into the ground, Mission Brewery was born in those heady first days of the 20th century. And then prohibition shut it down. Re-established in 2007, we are honored to say that four months and four beers in, Mission was awarded two national medals at the Great American Beer Festival. Fast forward to 2010 our plunder of precious beer medals has gown considerably. Three Gold, three Silver and two Bronze medals now fill our bounty. A dream come true for long-time die-hard home brewers. From modest beginnings to a state of the art custom made brewery in the historic Wonderbread building just east of San Diego’s baseball stadium Petco Park. Our brewery should be brewing beer with in the month. Soon therafter our tasting bar will be open to the public. There’s nothing more enjoyable than a pint while watching the beer you’re drinking being made a few feet from where you’re sitting.
No catchy gimmicks. No national campaigns. Just great handcrafted beer made in San Diego!
name: Mission Brewery

description: Mississippi Brewing Company LLC plans be pouring beer in late 2013. What sets us apart from the rest is that we understand the need for local “Light Drinkable Beers” as well full flavored Craft beers.
name: Mississippi Brewing Company

description: Sitting between the tall stainless steel tanks of our brewery on one side, and the flowing waters of Grant Creek on the other side, you will find the MBC Tap Room and outdoor patio. The Tap Room features 2,000 square feet dedicated to providing a comfortable environment to enjoy a glass of Highlander, along with slice of artisan pizza and a salad.  The MBC outdoor patio sits aside Grant Creek, shaded by a long stretch of Cottonwood trees.  The main patio provides the perfect setting to enjoy being outdoors on a beautiful Montana day.
name: Missoula Brewing Company

description:
Dr.Mark Zilkoski, family doc in Wolf Point, Montana and Mark Sansaver have been drinking beers for years together. Originating their taste for quality on the front porch of Doc'Z homestead, the two micro-brewer sippers were often accompanied by fellow river bottom hoodlums such as Jeff Presser, Jeff Neubauer, Marvin Presser and of course the Z Matriarch-Mrs. Myrle (Mark) Zilkoski. And that is where it all began, on the Breaks of the Mighty Missouri-just a stone's throw from the steps of the Z Manor on the Big Muddy. The barley and the wheat grains are all American grown, harvested & malted:
Some of the brews are then roasted to the perfect temperature to produce the
precise amount of color and flavor.
name: Missouri Breaks Brewing

description: Crafting beer in the mountains of the Caribbean.
name: Mito Brewhouse CA

description:
Moa beer is the beer that comes from Marlborough, which is nice, because mostly Marlborough just makes wine, which is a bit boring. Moa uses the same deep bore water locals use to grow grapes and put out house fires.

Moa Beer is also made the way beer used to be made before everyone started making it differently.

So if somehow someone from 1950 travelled in time to go to the pub and had a Moa today they wouldn’t be surprised by its full bodied taste. This is because Moa beer is made by lots of people and not many machines as opposed to lots of machines and not many people. They would however, be surprised by the cost as Moa is quite expensive and they’d be used to only paying two and six. Whatever that is.
name: Moa Brewing Company

description: Moat Mountain is a 174-seat brew pub, restaurant & inn located in one of North Conway’s historic buildings. Our award-winning ales and lagers are brewed on-site with fresh mountain water. Enjoy a pint with us or take some home in a growler or keg.
name: Moat Mountain Smokehouse and Brewing Company

description:
MOBCRAFT IS THE WORLD’S FIRST COMPLETELY CROWDSOURCED BREWERY!

MobCraft Beer is a small craft brewery making custom craft beer. We produce small batch “custom craft beers” based off of users submitted recipes and ideas which end up in our recipe vault. Each month, you can vote on a wide variety of beer styles and flavors. Cast your vote by pre-ordering the beer you want us to brew. MobCraft will produce the beer with the most orders and ship out a 4 pack of 22oz “bomber” bottles to your doorstep! Or if you're near the brewery come pick it up in our tap room location in Madison, WI!
name: MobCraft Beer

description:
Moccasin Bend Brewing Company is located in the historic St. Elmo district of Chattanooga, TN.  We’re at the foot of Lookout Mountain just steps away from the world-famous Incline Railway and very near to the great Moccasin Bend of the Tennessee River. 

MBBC was started by two brewers whose quest for the perfect beer led them to learn the art of brewing.  Chris Hunt and Duncan Guy began their brewing education in the Barley Mob Brewers homebrewing club and continued to search for unique and distinctive ale and lager formulas. They decided to offer their creations to the public through a small batch microbrewery in 2006.  Soon thereafter, award-winning brewer Courtney Tyvand joined the two and presented his smoked porter at the brewery’s first beer dinner in October of 2006.

The brewery is located on the ground floor of a historic building at 4015 Tennessee Avenue in St. Elmo.  The building is constructed of foot-square cedar timbers and two-foot thick walls made of granite stone and mortar.  Built in 1911 as a packaging factory for K-Rations for WWI, we occasionally find artifacts from that era in the building walls and ceiling.  The brewery shares space with the Chattanooga U-Brew, a brew-on-premises business owned by Greg McCort. 

MBBC is proud to offer small batch specialty ales and lagers in kegs of various sizes.  A tasting room is part of the brewery; samples of our beers can be tasted and tested on premises.  Occasionally we have tasting events or tapping events at the brewery or at a nearby bar or restaurant.  Please check our calendar for scheduled tasting events at the brewery.
name: Moccasin Bend Brewing Company

description: Mockery Brewing is a craft brewery that focuses on bold flavors while maintaining the utmost respect for balance and quality. Our beer is handcrafted with specific attention paid to the sources of our ingredients. We do not restrict our beer to guidelines and rules, but brew for the love of the craft and our customers. From the novice to the expert connoisseur, we view our patrons as our friends and aim to provide an open, carefree environment for all to enjoy.
