In addition to their core products that include the multi award winning Jack O'Legs, Side Pocket for a Toad, Colley's Dog and Death or Glory the brewery also produces seasonal ales and monthly specials. From it's 30BB plant these are distributed across the UK and sold from their on site brewery shop.
name: Tring Brewery

description:
Always fresh, always crisp.
Crafted with the finest quality hops from around the world, and filtered Scituate Reservoir water from right here in Little Rhody.

The beers, ales, porters and stouts available at the Brewhouse Pub are brewed on premises - ensuring a high quality product that is always satisfying and never flat.

Our Brewmaster takes great pride in providing our customers with the freshest beer in the city.
If we were any fresher...you'd slap us!

Stop by for a pint or two in house - or grab a Growler To Go and enjoy great Trinity Brewhouse Beer at your own leisure.
name: Trinity Brewhouse

description: TRiNiTY BREWiNG Company is a Public Ale and Lager House. Inspired by Belgian and English tap houses, our pub focuses on three major concepts: Artisanal Beer, Slow Food, and Conscious People. Cheers!
name: TRiNiTY Brewing
Triple 7 Restaurant & Brewery at Main St Station

description: In October 2011 Triple C Brewing Company incorporated and our beer dreams started coming true. Triple C are Chris, Chris, and Christina. Chris and Chris met while working at a local bank and quickly realized we weren't cut out for banking and dreamed of owning our own business. While home brewing late one evening, the three Cs had a crazy idea to start a brewery. All of our hard work is finally paying off and we anticipate an early summer 2012 opening of our South End microbrewery! We can't wait to share our beer with Charlotte and beyond and look forward welcoming everyone to our spacious tap room very soon.
name: Triple C Brewing Company

description: Triple Crossing Brewing Company grew out of the love of great beer, and the idea that beer is best enjoyed when shared with friends, straight out of the tap.
name: Triple Crossing Brewing Company

description:
Triple Digit is the high gravity brand of Cincinnati's Listermann Brewing Company. Every Triple Digit beer is brewed at or above a triple digit gravity (1.100).

Welcome to the Next Level
name: Triple Digit Brewing Company
Triple J Chophouse and Brew Co

description:
Even as one of the oldest brewpubs in the country, Triple Rock is all about keeping things fresh. Fresh craft beer served along fresh food, with menus and specials changing and updating all the time. On any two consecutive days here you will likely find something new and different to try, or you’re welcome to stick with your favorites (those will be fresh too). 

That’s one of the advantages of Triple Rock, where you can watch our brewers make the beer and know that you’ll be drinking it as soon as its done—no kegging, no bottling necessary, just straight from the tanks to your glass. Also, with 11 serving tanks and 8 fermenters on the premises, we can always keep something fresh on our beer board. Do you feel yourself getting thirsty?
name: Triple Rock Brewery and Alehouse

description: Triple Voodoo Brewing is life to the extreme and at full volume. Born from the underground beer scene in San Francisco, we have been brewing some of the most extreme beer styles this city has seen to date! From our amazing and complex Inception Belgian Style Ale to our mind blowing 32% ABV Thermonuclear Stout that we conjured to compete for the "Strongest Beer in the World", our mission is to bring you an amazing high ABV craft beer line-up. Here's the team who work around the clock 24/7 to make all these happen.
name: Triple Voodoo Brewing

description:
Triplehorn Brewing Co. may  be considered “Just another WA brewery”, au contraire mon frere! Pardon my French. We are another GREAT WA brewery!

Our intent is to quench the thirst of the masses. Rice is not a primary ingredient in great beer, and we won’t compromise our Liquid of the Gods. If you have a malty, hoppy, silky big beer desire, you are welcome. Our taproom gives full vantage of the brewing experience. Come for the beer; enjoy the brash, bold, and often audacious intimacy.
name: Triplehorn Brewing Co.

description: A triptych (trip-tik) is a work of art, divided into three equal parts and built around a common theme. Triptych Brewing is three guys from three different walks of life sharing our passion for great, local beer with YOU. Built upon the traditional ingredients of hops, barley, and water and serving the communities of Champaign, Urbana, and Savoy, Triptych Brewing is dedicated to exploring the art of craft beer with the community.
name: Triptych Brewing

description:
Operated by its member-managers, Jon W. Lang and David M. Waldman, Triton Brewing Company is a brewery producing high-quality craft beer for distribution in Indiana. 

Triton Brewing Company is a creative outlet in the form of a traditional, community-based production brewery located in the heartland of Indiana. The shareholders, employees, and libations of Triton Brewing Company embody exemplary strength of character, resolute integrity, and consistent quality in all their forms. We are dedicated to increasing a sense of fun and community through the creation of fine traditionally crafted ale and lager.

Beer and other beverages produced at our Indianapolis facility are available for sale throughout Indiana and Central Illinois. A tasting room at the brewery and a second tap room location provide other marketing opportunities.

Triton Brewing Company is the realization of the dream of Mr. Lang and Mr. Waldman that Indiana be a significant contributor to the world beer culture and can produce local beers that Hoosiers can be proud of and can purchase statewide.
name: Triton Brewing Company

description: Restaurant & Brewery Serving Our Own Craft Beer and Locally Grown Organic Foods
name: Triumph Brewing Company

description:
Tröegs Brewing Company was established in 1997 by brothers Chris and John Trogner. Since then, the Central PA natives have been handcrafting world-class beers that blend traditional brewing techniques with the innovation and eclecticism of the American craft brewing movement. Today, the Hershey, PA-based brewery produces six year-round beers (Hopback Amber Ale, Troegenator Double Bock, JavaHead Stout, Tröegs Pale Ale, DreamWeaver Wheat, and Perpetual IPA); four seasonal releases as part of the Hop Cycle series (Cultivator Helles Bock, Sunshine Pils, Hop Knife Harvest Ale, and Blizzard of Hops Winter IPA); and two limited beers (Nugget Nectar and Mad Elf Ale). 

In addition to these beers, Tröegs produces a variety of experimental, small batch beers as part of its Scratch Beer Series. These beers are available exclusively at the brewery and most are draft-only limited releases, although some popular Scratch Beers (Fresh Hop Ale, Fest Lager, etc.) are bottled for release through the General Store at the brewery. 

In late 2013, Tröegs introduced a special line of cork & cage bottle releases. The first, LaGrave, is available year-round. Master of Pumpkins was also released in 2013 and will continue with availability in the fall. Other beers such as Jovial have since followed suit. The addition of a canning line not only offers the brewery more flexibility in the way it presents its beers, but also allows Tröegs to provide customers with more packaging options. To date, Tröegs has released Perpetual IPA and Sunshine Pils in 12-ounce cans and Troegenator in 16-ounce cans. Plans to release other seasonal and limited beers in cans are currently in the works. 

The Splinter Series is an extremely limited line of barrel-aged beers packaged in cork & cage bottles. While only a handful of these beers have been produced, Tröegs plans to expand this series with the inclusion of Nebulous (barrel-aged LaGrave with Brett), bourbon barrel-aged Troegenator, and others. 

Tröegs currently distributes its beers throughout Delaware, Massachusetts, Maryland, New Jersey, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Virginia and Washington D.C. In addition, Tröegs plans to expand into other New England markets in 2015.

Our state-of-the-art facility gives visitors a glimpse into the workings of a full production brewery by offering both guided tasting and self-guided tours. Our Tasting Room provides ample seating with views of the brewhouse, where you can sit back and enjoy one of our six year-round beers as well as a variety of seasonal and small-batch experimental brews. 

Our Snack Bar reflects our constant desire to explore, discover and share by focusing on fresh, simple fare that is locally sourced and house-made. With that in mind, we feature a seasonally rotating menu with daily chef’s specials.

www.troegs.com
name: Tröegs Brewing Company

description: Passion must be lived and shared. I'm lucky to be able to do both with beer. I often think of chefs, painters and musician living a similar adventure. A painter touches up, deletes, isn't satisfied, adds another coat, works, has doubts, decides and then finds… For us craft brewers it's pretty much the same : beers as I think them up evolve in my mind, on my palate. Fro one brew to the next, I may adjust the hopping, change one malt type or the other, add a touch of sharpness, alter the fermentation temperature or the quantity of yeast I pitch the brew with…
name: Trois Dames

description: Trophy Brewing Co. represents Chris Powers and David “Woody” Lockwood’s long-held dream of having their own brewery. A place where they can take ideas about and for beers, scratched down on napkins over late night drinking sessions, and turn them into a reality. Trophy is not big, we feature a 3 BBL brewhouse with 3 single batch and 2 double batch fermenters; but what does come out of those tanks; we take pride in.
name: Trophy Brewing Company

description: A 100% Irish owned brewery located in Kill, Co. Kildare. We’re dedicated to producing distinctive and outstanding beer from only natural ingredients.
name: Trouble Brewing

description:
Trout River Brewing was founded in July 1996 by Dan and Laura Gates. We began brewing in early December of that year. We still own and operate this microbrewery in the northeastern region of Vermont--The Northeast Kingdom! Come visit this special and beautiful place and taste all that the Kingdom has to offer.

Trout River Brewing prides itself on creating and serving fresh, all natural, premium ales and lagers. Our beers are made with pure Vermont water, the best imported and domestic malts and hops, and quality yeasts. Nothing else is added and we take nothing away!
name: Trout River Brewing

description:
We are unlike any other venue that we know of. We have our own award winning Brewery and Chef, an Argentinean Restaurant + a contemporary function space with floor to ceiling views of Port Phillip Bay. 

We like the words generous and uncomplicated. We like the fact that we are in a location that is across the road from the beach and out of the city, but not as far as the peninsula.

We like to say... 'When in doubt head, True South'. We also like questions...so just ask!
name: True South

description: American and European brewmasters have come together to create the Trumer Brauerei Berkeley. With a passionate commitment to the Pilsner style, this international team has worked tirelessly to preserve every detail of the original Trumer Pils process of its centuries old brewery in Salzburg, Austria. Their efforts have paid off. Trumer Brauerei Berkeley combines the heritage and tradition of the old world with the new world's dedication to craft brewing.
name: Trumer Brauerei

description: TRVE Brewing is the Denver brewery dedicated to bringing you beer that's beyond the pale. A neighborhood spot where you can hang out and have some killer beer.
name: TRVE Brewing Company

description:
Tuckahoe Brewing Company was established in January of 2011 by four friends who had been brewing beer for fun for several years. We were brewing five and ten gallon batches while we barbequed and enjoyed drinking beer with family and friends. Going to the next level and brewing commercially was a thought that was always in the back of each our minds, but after we heard enough of our friends say ...the same thing, we decided to take the idea seriously. 

We expect to begin with four recipes, a Belgian Wit, an English Style Porter, a Pale Ale. Cape May County is a beautiful place, and brewing a beer that captures that beauty in both its ingredients and the finished product is one of our goals. We want to provide the people of Cape May County beers that will always remind them of home.

Please look for our beers on tap in bars and restaurants around Cape May County, and bottled for take home as well. Also, please stop by and see us this fall at 9 Stoney Road in Dennis Township.
name: Tuckahoe Brewing Company

description:
The Mount Washington Valley of NH's Local Brew. Offering four hand-crafted brews. Available in stores and restuarants in NH, MA & ME.

Tuckerman Brewing Co. brews our beer in the most green manner possible, using as many local ingredients and packaging materials as possible.

In 1998, Tuckerman Brewing Co. was founded with a love of the White Mountains of NH, in particular Mount Washington and the desire to create a fine hand crafted beer
name: Tuckerman Brewing Company

description: Tugboat Ale is remarkably different from the glut of pasteurized "can beer made available by other beverage merchants.  Using the time honored traditions of brewers in Great Britain, our ales retain their freshness because the yeast is allowed to live.  A slow process of fermentation continues in our kegs, allowing the beer to retain an unparalleled freshness.  What's more, we deliberately choose not to filter our beer.  The pasteurization process that strips body and color from beer is a necessary evil in 'big batch' commercial brewing.  But, thankfully, that ain't us. We filter our coffee. Not our beer.
name: Tugboat Brewing Company

description: Located in Southeast Pennsylvania in Spring City, PA, Tuned Up Brewing is getting ready to open it's doors to hard rock fans to come in and enjoy some real in your face brews!
name: Tuned Up Brewing Company

description: Northern Michigan's Microbrewery located just north of Harbor Springs on the beautiful and scenic M119 (Tunnel of Trees Scenic Byway).
name: Tunnel Vision Brewery

description:
An interest in history and beer led Bob and Ellie Tupper to  a quest throughout the United States and Europe to talk to brewers and sample classic examples of traditional brewing styles.  In 1978 they began taking formal tasting notes on each new beer they could find.

By the early 1990s the Tuppers had tasted and evaluated over 6,000 beers and visited hundreds of breweries.  They had found many excellent beers, but envisioned an ale that no one had made—one that would encompass bold American flavors and traditional European brewing techniques.  They asked Old Dominion Brewing Co., which they felt was one of the very best craft breweries in the country, to work with them to develop this ideal ale.  Tuppers’ Hop Pocket Ale was the result.  

In 1997 the Tuppers again worked with the Old Dominion brewers to create Tuppers’ Hop Pocket Pils, based on the Keller or Hefe Pils style of Northern Bavaria, but with a unique American boldness to the flavor.

The Tuppers live in Bethesda, Maryland, where Bob teaches history.  Ellie works in Washington as a production editor of scientific books.  The Tuppers still travel and taste beers and now have notes on over 14,000 different brews.
name: Tuppers' Hop Pocket Brewing Company

description: TUPPS Brewery has a sense of place. We are proud to be in Texas, in the great city of McKinney and located at the historic Cotton Mill. When you visit, keep in mind that we want you to embrace the brewery, so put your feet on the tables, write your name on the wall and bring old bottles to add to our bottle tree farm.
name: TUPPS Brewery

description: Located just minutes from downtown Bloomsburg and Bloomsburg University off of Exit 236 on Interstate 80 and directly adjacent to The Inn at Turkey Hill,  Turkey Hill Brewing Company Pub & Grille offers casual dining in a unique atmosphere as well as some of the area’s best craft beer brewed on site.
name: Turkey Hill Brewing Company

description:
Turoni's Pizzery & Brewery takes great pride in serving you, and we thank you. We are dedicated to warm and friendly service to our guests by employees who give a damn. We pledge to provide the best products at the best value. If we are not proud of it we WILL NOT serve it!

Turoni's pizza has been made in Evansville for over three decades, yet never before has the recipe been reproduced by commercial establishments because of the difficulties involved in preparation.

Turoni's has been able to overcome these difficulties to share with you a freshly made pizza crust that is crisp and light enough to hold our secret sauce, gobs of gooey mozzarella cheese, and your favorite ingredients (including a few exotic ones) to make what we call "Our Specialty", Turoni's thin crust pizza. This flavor and texture makes Turoni's pizza very unique.
name: Turoni's Main Street Brewery

description: Turoni's Pizzery & Brewery takes great pride in serving you, and we thank you. We are dedicated to warm and friendly service to our guests by employees who give a damn. We pledge to provide the best products at the best value. If we are not proud of it we WILL NOT serve it!
name: Turoni's Pizza & Brewery

description: Turoni's Pizzery & Brewery takes great pride in serving you, and we thank you. We are dedicated to warm and friendly service to our guests by employees who give a damn. We pledge to provide the best products at the best value. If we are not proud of it we WILL NOT serve it!
name: Turoni's Pizzery & Brewery

description: Turtle Anarchy Brewing Company is a family owned microbrewery in Franklin, TN specializing in craft brewed ales.
name: Turtle Anarchy Brewing Company

description:
he Story Behind Turtle Mountain Brewing Company
TMBC is the end result of way too much dreaming (and drinking) on the part of the proprietor, Nico Ortiz. Starting with a student exchange to Germany when he was 16, he has dedicated his life to the pursuit of good beer. This brewpub is the result of over 23 years of "market research" in hundreds of bars, brewpubs, breweries, garages, and beer festivals all over the world.

The name " Turtle Mountain" comes from the Tewa name for Sandia Peak. Alfonso Ortiz (Nico's father) was born and raised at Oke Owingeh, north of Espanola, and one of six Pueblos that speak Tewa. Nico's father's Indian name was "Oku Pin", which translates as " Turtle Mountain". As a tribute to his father, who provided the inspirational and financial means to open the pub, Nico has named it Turtle Mountain Brewing Company.
name: Turtle Mountain Brewing Company

description: Tustin Brewery began in 1996 and is Tustin's most popular place to meet, eat and drink the best brews in Orange County. Our mug club is over 1200 members strong!
name: Tustin Brewing Company

description: We are a full service brewpub, restaurant, and poolhall located in downtown Decatur, GA. Open since 1996, we have been brewing our own crafted ales since November 2006, with Jordan Fleetwood on board as our brewmaster. Join us soon for a pint or two, some fresh, tasty grub, and few friendly games. We look forward to seeing you!
name: Twain's Billiards and Tap

description:
Balanced. Finessed. Pleasant. Yeah, not so much.

Our beers are dry-tasting and dry-hopped, with a flavor profile that is anything but 'balanced.'  Our beers are like us; boisterous, unpretentious, and fun.
name: Twelve Bar Brews

description:
Our passion for great brews and great food both began in the kitchen. Dan started brewing around 1990, using extracts. He took up the hobby in earnest which meant taking over the garage 5 years ago and transitioning to all-grain brewing. Both Dan and Elle love to cook and brewing days became a natural outlet for hosting all days BBQs with family and friends. The 5-gallon kettle over the kitchen stove grew to a half-barrel, propane-fueled brew rig. And the backyard gained a pellet-smoker alongside the Weber grill. That’s what we call going the distance with brewing and charcuterie!

With family and friends raving about our creation, it’s time to take it seriously. We entered the 2011 California State Fair and won three medals including first place for our Knock-Out Stout and second place for The Contender – our Pale Ale. The following year we won first place for our Scottish Ale which we plan on featuring as one of our seasonal brews.

In early 2012 we decided to pursue opening our own microbrewery. Our first challenge seemed almost insurmountable: finding a name! We hit trademark snags with our first three names and finally scored with Twelve Rounds.
name: Twelve Rounds Brewing Company

description:
Located in Spokane Valley, WA, 12 String Brewing Company marries the brewer’s love of music, especially the 12 string guitar, with his passion for brewing spectacular beer. Our goal is to craft a variety of great beer in the Northwest tradition. We will also feature several other beers from our brewing friends.

Yes, 12 string brewing company crafts great beer in the Northwest tradition. This is an example of a small scale brewing company at its best! The brewery includes an onsite tap room with plenty of seating and from time to time, great live music.  And when not brewing one of his great beers, you just may just find the brewer hanging out, playing his 12 string guitar.
name: Twelve String Brewing Company

description:
In 1985, while attending the University of California at Berkeley, Samuel Hobbs wrote a chemistry paper, for a laugh, on “aqueous beer foam” (the head of a beer). It would take 21 years for that initial interest to manifest itself into something drinkable. The spark would come after 9/11 while he drank homebrewed stout with five of his friends. Motivated by patriotic feelings and the American dream of creating a business, the energy was set in motion to start Twin Lakes Brewing Company. Weeks later, Sam and his longtime friends Matt Day, Jack Wick, and Mark Fesche developed a unique 15 gallon gravity fed pilot system and began working to create their first signature brews.

They decided to locate the brewery at the beautiful “Twin Lakes Farm” in Greenville, Delaware. This historic 252 acre farm has been in Sam’s family for seven generations and has a deep rock well aquifer which supplies perfect water for brewing. Local artisans converted an old tractor barn and art studio to accommodate a five vessel, gravity fed brewery and tasting room. Finally, on April 13, 2006, the first two brands, Greenville Pale Ale and Route 52 Pilsner, were launched. 

Today Twin Lakes Brewery also produces Tweed’s Tavern Stout, Caesar Rodney Golden Ale and Winterthur Wheat, as well as seasonal styles Oktoberfest and Jublicious. Currently, Twin Lakes beer is available on tap at many fine restaurants and taverns in Delaware and Southeastern Pennsylvania. Growlers (half gallon jugs of beer) can be purchased at the brewery and kegs are available at most regional beer and liquor stores.
name: Twin Lakes Brewing Company
Twin Peaks Brewing and Malting Co.

description: Located inside the Twin Peaks restaurant at the N. Irving, Texas location. This system has a 10,000 bbl. annual capacity and will supply all of the Twin Peaks locations in Texas.
name: Twin Peaks Brewing Co.

description: Adam's Northwest Bistro & Brewery focuses on taking Northwest ingredients, and turning it into something good and comforting on your plate. We pride ourselves in making our dishes from scratch, from our slow cooked braises and hand formed burgers, to our hot soups and even our Bacon! Not only is our food from scratch but we brew our own hand-crafted beers next door also. Our goal is to provide you with service and atmosphere as if you were eating in our home.
name: Twin Rivers Brewing

description:
Brewed by a pair of self-confessed beer geeks with a tendency for over-analyzing and constantly tweaking their recipes, there is no term to describe Twisted Barrel Ale, so we came up with our own:

pico-   denoting a factor of 10^-12
name: Twisted Barrel Ale

description: A micro-brewery that offers quality craft beer for carryout in half gallon refillable glass containers. Also, check back in the future to find out where and when it will be available at your nearby bar or store.
name: Twisted Crew Brewing Company

description: Twisted Manzanita Ales craft brewery specializing in beers brewed with passion and creativity. We are a proud member of the craft beer industry, and work to maintain a standard of craft beer companies.
name: Twisted Manzanita Ales

description: Twisted Pine has been handcrafting award-winning ales in Boulder, Colorado since 1995.
name: Twisted Pine Brewing Company

description: All of our beers are hand-crafted on site. Stop in for a tasting, a pint, or get a growler to go.
name: Twisted Rail Brewing Company

description:
Twisted Tea Brewing Company was founded in 2001 on the twisted promise that a hard iced tea should taste like real iced tea.

Since 2001, our Tea brewmasters (yes, their job is as cool as it sounds) have been committed to brewing a hard iced tea that not only tastes like real iced tea but also delivers an incredibly smooth and refreshing drinking experience.
name: Twisted Tea

description: Microbrewery and Tasting room.
name: Twisted Trunk Brewing

description: Tex Mex Beer - Mexican style Lagers with a Texas twist.
name: Twisted X Brewing Company

description:
Two Beers Brewing Company is a microbrewery located in SoDo that distributes to Bars and Restaurants. Our tasting room is open 3-7pm Thursday and Friday.

Our Mission is to provide the finest beverages to the discerning drinkers of the Pacific Northwest
name: Two Beers Brewing Company

description: Two Birds Brewing was hatched in 2011, and is the culmination of a couple of friends who had a vision to balance the enjoyment of the finer things in life, with both work and play. They have set out in a small flock of two to make flavoursome, interesting and approachable beers and share their passion with others.
name: Two Birds Brewing

description:
After living in France, the Ebel brothers developed a passion for flavorful specialty beer. After returning to the states, they had trouble finding that type of beer in Chicago so they opened Two Brothers Brewing Company in 1996. To get them started, the brothers' grandfather, a retired dairy farmer, donated his bulk milk tanks, which were quickly converted to fermenters. Currently, the brewery resides in a 40,000 square foot facility 30 miles west of Chicago. In addition to their traditional style beers, Two Brothers Brewing Company produces many specialty beers including the Project Opus Sour series. Adjacent to the brewery, Two Brothers Tap House opened in 2008 as a restaurant which serves elevated, seasonal, and organic American pub fare. In 2011, the Ebel brothers purchased Walter Payton's Roundhouse located in Aurora, IL. The Two Brothers Roundhouse is a full service brewpub restaurant, music venue, offers banquet space for large parties and weddings and hosts the Two Brothers Cafe and Beer Bar! 

Two Brothers Brewing Company's award winning products are currently available in Illinois, Indiana, Ohio, Minnesota, Pennsylvania, Florida, New York, Iowa and Missouri.
name: Two Brothers Brewing Company

description: Two Fathers Beer Company is a family sharing a passion for what we love: Coastal Virginia, handcrafting, and (obviously) beer. Throw that in a vat and you’ve got a lip-smacking selection for craft-beer aficionados, casual beer drinkers and everyone in between.
name: Two Fathers Beer Company

description: To bring great beer and great friends together because great friends deserve great beer. Coming soon to West Michigan. A new Microbrewery with an old feel. A low key, easy going and relaxed pub to meet up with friends, have a hand crafted beer and conversation.
name: Two Fisted Brewing Company

description: Built in a renovated 19th Century barn with a sweeping view of Seneca Lake, Two Goats Brewing is an unpretentious gathering place on the Finger Lakes Wine Trail for people who just want to drink great beer and enjoy time with their friends. Or make some new ones!
name: Two Goats Brewing

description:
The Two Henrys Brewing Company brews modern and traditional hand-crafted beer styles in small batches in Plant City, FL. Because local and small is just better.

With our beers we celebrate Florida’s short history and people that made our great state possible. We strive to make great beers and sneak in a Florida history lesson whether you want it or not. 

Our beers can be found at our tasting room starting on or about October 1, 2013 and select bars and restaurants in the Tampa Bay area. In the meantime, read about our coming beers and namesakes ,the Two Henrys, below…or don’t.
name: Two Henrys Brewing Company

description: Two Kilts Brewing Co. was founded in 2009 by owners and brewers Chris Dillon, and Alex McGaw.  Fueled by a passion for all things craft beer they opened a modest 6  barrel brewery and in 2 short years have expanded to their current 15 barrel brewery. They specialize in hand crafting fine American Ales and Lagers, brewed with hints of European influence.
name: Two Kilts Brewing Co

description:
The "Two Rascals" are Daniel and Brandon, wildland firefighters with the dream of starting a brewery together. When not protecting our beautiful state from fire, they can be found homebrewing, working on recipes, studying the business of craft brew and spending time with family and friends. 

The Rascals have been dreaming up their brewery for three years.  As of 2012, they are no longer dreaming but instead, putting in the man hours and hard labor it takes to build a brewery in a historic building.

The “Two Rascals Brewing Company” will provide much needed distribution of local craft brewed beer to the western slope. Their general concept
is to offer a variety of craft beers; ranging from light to full-bodied flavors.
name: Two Rascals Brewing Company

description: Located in a 200 year old hotel, the restaurant/bar still retains its historic charm while functioning as brewery.  The award winning menu features gastropub fare.  The beer is brewed on a 7 bbl system by Josh Bushey and they feature 10 house made beers on tap.  Both 64 oz. and 32 oz. growlers are available for takeout.
name: Two Rivers Brewing Company

description:
Two Roads isn’t just the logo on our brewery building, it’s our philosophy. Life always seems to offer up two ways to go. It just so happens, we prefer the one less taken and having some fun along the way – in our lives, our careers and especially for our beers!
Now our “road less traveled” philosophy is being brought to life in the beers that we create and how we create them.
name: Two Roads Brewing Company

description: Two-Shy Brewing crafts fine ales and lagers like Phat Odd Stout, Influence IPA, Dead-On Amber, Reformation Red, Picnic Pale, Ignition Double IPA, Everlasting ESB, Toby's Best, Uberdunkelweizen and more!
name: Two-Shy Brewing

description:
Two22 Brew is a place to socialize, find out about local charities, & give where you live--all while enjoying a great beer. 

Two22 Brew is partnered with a small, local family foundation. Their mission is to carry out a broad range of charitable gifting to support Colorado entities in the fields of education, environmental action, and whole person enrichment. 

Two22 Brew will give back $2.22 of every $10 of profit to local non-profits.
name: Two22 Brew

description:
Ever since our Grand Opening in August 2014, we’ve been on a mission to brew passionately handcrafted beer, to cultivate an atmosphere that brings people together, and to have fun doing so! We look at our beer not just as a beverage, but as a lifestyle.  We choose the better things in life—family, friends, community, and obviously incredible craft beer.

At our downtown Indianapolis location, we are a malt-forward production brewery and a destination TapRoom for craft beer enthusiasts of all kinds.

Having originated from home brewing, we want to make sure that our ideals and our close connection to our beer never get lost—no matter how big the system may be.  We will strive to stay true to our roots and continue to make beer that’s never compromised.
name: TwoDEEP Brewing Co.

description:
he legend of Tyranena (pronounced Tie·rah·nee·nah) began long ago, in a time before history was written. Legend tells of a foreign tribe that built a series of stone structures and effigy mounds on the edge of a lake they called Tyranena.

Today, these structures lie preserved deep under the waters of Rock Lake. No one knows for sure who built them, the purposes they served, how and why they are now submerged, or even the meaning of the word Tyranena.

We invite you to develop your own theories while enjoying one of the new legends of Tyranena, the Legendary Wisconsin Beers of the Tyranena Brewing Company.

Ask for a Legendary Wisconsin Beer where you drink.
name: Tyranena Brewing Company

description:
Kompania Piwowarska is a brewing company established in Poland in 1999 as a result of the merger of two SABMiller owned Polish breweries, Lech Browary Wielkopolski S.A. in Poznań and Browary Tyskie Górny Śląsk SA. in Tychy. Browary Tyskie Górny Śląsk was founded in 1629. The company also owns the Dojlidy Brewery in Białystok.

The three breweries have a total capacity of 15.1 million hectolitres. SABMiller purchased a majority share in the Lech and Tyskie breweries in 1995.
name: Tyskie Kompania Piwowarska

description:
Überbrew: Superlative Beer

Combining atmosphere, music, food, service and award winning beer to provide the customer with the best tap room experience.
name: Überbrew

description: For over 30 years we have been brewing our flavour-packed beers in the Rheingasse in the heart of Basel's old town.
name: ueli Bier

description:
Named after the only major east-west running mountain range located in the continental U.S., Uinta Brewing Company's journey began in 1993 with the reality that passion for craft beer and a hankering for the great outdoors could align in Salt Lake City, UT.
 
Built on an axis point that endorses sustainability, community involvement and innovation, their compass guides them on a path to admirable, consistent craft beer leading consumers to discover a brand with passion, personality and soul.  Precisely, GREAT BEER is Uinta's True North.
name: Uinta Brewing Company

description:
The first certified organic brewpub in the nation! 
Our food and beer is organic!
Our beer is brewed on site. 
Our burgers are ground fresh daily.
We buy from local farmers, local wineries and local fisheries!
We love sustainability!
name: Ukiah Brewing Company

description:
“COME, SIT AND STAY”

Who Was Uncle Bear, You Ask?

 

    Well he was a fun loving good fella, of the Labrador mix named “Bear”. In the good ole’ days as a young pup, he could be found cruising the college campus at Texas Tech University in Lubbock, body surfin’ at Doggie Beach in Ocean Beach (San Diego), skiing down the snow capped mountains in Ruidoso, New Mexico, relaxing in the Hot Springs of Arkansas and finally making his home in the Valley of the Sun. Since Bear was an active dog and on the go, he wanted to create a place where he and his friends could “Come, Sit And Stay”.

    Well Uncle Bears’ Brewhouse Grill is that place. Born out of Bear’s  love for craft beer and excellent food, we have created an upbeat, fun atmosphere where friends, family and co-workers can come to enjoy a variety of delicious menu selections & NOW our own locally brewed craft beer. The Uncle Bear’s Brewhouse opened in 2013, as well as the 4 Grill and Bar locations were re-branded to the Grill and Tap concept that same year.

On the menu, whenever you see Bear’s paw print  you can be assured the item is a long-term house favorite or a new favorite we are sure Bear would have loved. Try any one of the items from the “Famous” Sliders, Backyard Burgers and Birds, Big Plates and Serious Sizzles, Gourmet Pizza, Bear “Bites” or Wing selections and you are in for a true treat.    

The unique motif has been designed to resemble all of the places Bear or your family dog would hang out such as the garage, backyard or home.

 In addition to the excellent food menu, we feature fantastic house drinks and NOW a wonderful selection of craft beers brewed on site in our state of the art display brewery. Be sure to try a Flight Bone (5-4oz. tasters) or a Growler (64oz. take-home jug) or a pint of our craft beer. With all the goodies mentioned above and numerous sporting events on a slew of TV’s, we promise you will be treated to a “Doggone Good” experience compliments of our attentive, knowledgeable and enthusiastic team..
name: Uncle Bear's Brewhouse Grill

description:
Uncle Billy’s Brewery is located in the heart of South Austin on Barton Springs Road, with a short walk to Barton Springs Pool and Zilker Park.
Uncle Billy's Brewery and Barbecue features a brewery on site serving hand crafted beers by brewer Michael Waters. Uncle Billy's offers a delicious menu that includes barbecue, burgers and salads. Enjoy drinks and live music on the dog friendly outdoor patio.

Award-winning beers from on-site microbrewery & delicious BBQ! Daily specials, happy hour & outdoor seating.
name: Uncle Billy's Brewery
Uncle Ernies Bayfront Grill & Brew House

description:
Uncle Leo’s Brewery is located in Lyon’s Brook, Nova Scotia along the scenic bank of the West River, 2 kilometers from the town of Pictou.

Uncle Leo’s Brewery is the dream of Brewer, Karl Whiffen and is wife Rebecca and named for Karl’s Great Uncle Leo who brewed and sold his own ales out of his General Store in Newfoundland in the 1940’s.

Newly opened in June of 2013 Uncle Leo’s Brewery produces fine ale in the traditional style of craft breweries.  Our beer is made from various malts, hops, yeast and water with no added fillers or preservatives.  Uncle Leo’s is one of a few breweries to make beer from fresh well water.
name: Uncle Leo's Brewery

description: Uncommon Brewers (UB) is a community-oriented organic microbrewery beginning operations in Santa Cruz county. Incorporating traditional Belgian brewing techniques, cutting-edge innovation from the modern West Coast, and grounded in the principles of sustainability voiced by the Slow Food Movement, our goal is to make uncommon beers for uncommon people. After nearly six years of research and development, we are now ready to bring that vision to market.
name: Uncommon Brewers

description: Our 15-barrel brewery is dedicated to the production of high profile ales for our UnderCover allies. We encourage you to visit the brewery located in Blairsden, California. Take a tour of the brewery and enjoy our high profile ales while relaxing or playing a game of disc golf.
name: Under Cover Ale Works

description:
Houston's newest microbrewery is on its way!

We're in our start-up phase, dotting I's, crossing T's on our business plan and  looking for a commercial space to call home.

What we have done is brew some great brew in our garages!  We can't wait to get up and running in a commercial setting.  We've had tons of people, both beer afficianados and newbies, try our beer and they love it!  That is why we are moving to a commercial scale. If we had a dollar for every time someone said, "Hey where can I buy this?", we'll we'd have most of our start-up capital!
name: Under the Radar Brewery

description: A Chicago Craft Brewery focused on making great beer with an emphasis on Belgian and French styles.
name: Une Année Brewery

description:
União Cervejeira SA (Unicer), is a Portuguese beer producer, owner of several beer brands, including Super Bock, Cristal, Cheers, Cool Beer, Clok, and is the Portuguese distributor for Carlsberg, Tuborg, Guinness, Tetley's, and Kilkenny. One of the most famous is Super Bock, the market leader in the country (42% market share/Sept. 1998). The company is headquartered in Leça do Balio, near Porto in northern Portugal. It also has assets in the mineral water business, including the Pedras Salgadas brand. In Angola, Unicer holds the main imported beer brands.
Bebidas de Portugal, S.A. has businesses in other related sectors like fruit drinks, iced tea and other soft drinks, mineral water, wine, tourism and coffee.
name: União Cervejeira SA

description: There is more to certain beers than simple refreshment. Unibroue has raised the standards of conventional beer in by brewing craftsman beers for savouring.  Of incomparable quality and a taste, the beers at Unibroue are entirely natural, contain no chemical additives or preservatives, and are made with first quality ingredients.  Rediscover beer with Unibroue. You will never taste beer the same way again!
name: Unibroue

description: Union Ale is Santa Barbara's sports bar and ale house. We specialize in Burgers, Flatbreads and Craft Beer. We have Santa Barbara's best onsite beer selections with 24 taps of craft beers from across the nation. We have a bottled beer list that will make you drool. We smoke our meats in house and bake our breads in house. Showing every NFL game, Lakers and Clippers game, and all of your favorite March Madness, Union Ale is the place to be. So come on down and fill up a boot. Cheers.
name: Union Ale Brewing Company

description: Union Barrel Works is a restaurant and brew pub located in Reamstown, Pennsylvania in an historic building which originally functioned as a hardware store. It later became Reamstown Garment and was a sewing factory. The building itself was built in 1911 and still has the original hardwood maple floors and authentic tin ceiling. Come visit us for a great atmosphere, better food and excellent beer!
name: Union Barrel Works

description: At Union Brewing Company, our artisan ales are hand crafted two barrels at a time using time honored traditions, natural ingredients and traditional methods. Our beers are never filtered or force carbonated. They condition and carbonate naturally in casks and are hand drawn by authentic beer engines at the perfect drinking temperature to maximize all the flavors. (No, they are not warm!) We really like beer, and we love cask conditioned real ales. We think you will too!
name: Union Brewing Company

description: Union Craft Brewing is a homegrown, independent craft brewery located in the Clipper Mill area of Woodberry. We are dedicated to providing the good people of Baltimore fresh, handcrafted, and approachable beers and to fostering the community that forms whenever great beer is flowing.
name: Union Craft Brewing Company

description: Bringing great wood fired pizza, beer, and atmosphere to guests in a family friendly environment. Located in downtown Fergus Falls, MN.
name: Union Pizza & Brewing Co.

description: Small Artisan Kombucha Manufacturer located in Michigan that began selling in 2009. Has evolved product into a Kombucha Tea that may contain more than 0.5% ABV to keep the integrity, maximum nutrient content, texture, and flavor intact and impeccable. Also selling first pure Kombucha Beer on the market, Triple Goddess, in Raspberry and Ginger that contains 8-9% ABV. Company currently operates out of small micro-brewery in Depot Town, Ypsilanti, Michigan.
name: Unity Vibration Living Kombucha Tea

description:
Live Without Boundaries.

Man needs job. Man finds a job. Man finds a passion in that job.
That passion becomes a life mission written on a napkin (own a brewery by age 30.)
That mission becomes:
THE UNKNOWN BREWING COMPANY.
name: Unknown Brewing

description: Belgian & Stateside Ales in Tonka Bay, MN
name: Unmapped Brewing Co.

description: Provide awesome hand crafted beers in a one of a kind atmosphere that blends our attitude with a fully restored historic building from the 1890's.
name: Unruly Brewery

description: Die Schloßbrauerei Unterbaar ist eine der ältesten historisch belegten Privatbrauereien Bayerns. Die regionale Verbundenheit im Zusammenspiel mit dem Streben nach höchster Qualität prägt seit 400 Jahren das Bild der Brauerei. Diese Erfahrung sowie die Nutzung modernster Technik garantiert heute mehr denn je die Spitzenqualität der Produkte. Die lange Tradition des Hauses ist für das heutige Management sowie alle Mitarbeiter Ansporn und Verpflichtung. Damit es auch in Zukunft heißt: Unterbaarer Bier - Geschmack der begeistert!
name: Unterbaarer

description: We’ve been brewing ales, lagers, and sours in Bloomington, Indiana since 1998. Many of our brews are unique twists on traditional recipes, while others are products of our own imaginations. We’re proud to say that several of our beers have brought home national and international medals and awards, but what we really care about is brewing the kinds of beer we like to drink, and providing a fresh local option to our communities. It never hurts to get a pat on the back, though! Along the way, we’ve made lots of friends and drank our unfair share of good beer, all while trying to do good in our communities and do well as a craft brewery.
name: Upland Brewing Company

description:
We are a young brewery, but our passion runs deep.

Our founder and president, Larry Bell (yes, of Bell’s Brewery) has family roots that go back a 100 years.

That family connection has brought him back to the U.P. time and time again and opening a brewery here fulfills a lifelong dream that began underneath the falls at Tahquamenon.

From St. Ignace to Houghton to Ironwood and all the way down to Menominee, our beer is brewed where it’s meant to be enjoyed – Michigan’s Upper Peninsula.

With a 20-barrel brewhouse in Esky (Escanaba to those unfamiliar), built primarily from local contractors with equipment made in the USA, we brew and package beer that celebrates the beauty and uniqueness of the north and our community.

You can find Upper Peninsula Ale (UPA), Escanaba Black Beer and Upper Hand Lager on draught and in bottles throughout the U.P.

But you won’t find our beer below the (Mackinac) Bridge. Just one more reason to come up and visit this gorgeous and wondrous place we are proud to call home.
name: Upper Hand Brewery

description: Upright Brewing specializes in farmhouse inspired beers rooted in France and Belgium but made with local ingredients and a Pacific Northwest twist. The name is a reference to Charles Mingus and his primary instrument. Mingus was a musician whose compositions defy categorization. At Upright we use a special saison yeast and open fermenters to produce beers that are a true hybrid style, sharing Mingus’ spirit of exercising creativity and craft.
name: Upright Brewing Company

description:
Located in Boulder with two tap rooms (Flatiron Park & Lee Hill), Upslope taps into Colorado's active lifestyle by offering superior quality, hand-crafted ales & lagers in cans for the on-the-go beer enthusiast.

Ascend to New Heights.
name: Upslope Brewing Company

description: Upstate Brewing Company is a production craft brewery in the Southern Tier (Finger Lakes Region) of New York state. We are open Thurs/Fri/Sat 12-6 & you can watch our brew team in action those days. Our beers are currently on tap at restaurants and bars throughout New York State.
name: Upstate Brewing Company

description:
Derived from the Native American meaning of Omaha,  “upstream” or “against the current”, the Upstream Brewing  Company is just that—a restaurant different from the rest.

Since opening in 1996, the Upstream has been all about fresh—from the handcrafted beers to the locally grown produce to the lively atmosphere. Not to mention the friendly, knowledgeable staff. So stop in today, and find out why we’ve been named one of Omaha’s “Best” several years running.
name: Upstream Brewing Company

description: All our beers are wild. That means, in one way or the other, each and every one of our beers is brewed with locally caught wild yeast, bacteria, or mixed cultures of both. With micro-floral creatures such as Saccharomyces, Lactobacillus, Pediococcus, and Brettanomyces, it is the brewer’s job to get these wild microorganisms to create flavors that are tart and crisp, tropical and wild, and downright funky. It is the ultimate way to truly express a sense of place in our beers, to create beers that form with you a lasting experience, that have the effect of taking you to our brewery, taproom and venue with every sip. At the end of the day, here in the brewery, it is all about our microscopic wild friends.
name: Urban Artifact

description: Situated in an old 1920's garage that has been outfitted to accommodate our ‘new world meets old world’ brewery, UCBC is located in a district of St. Louis known as Midtown Alley—a part of town with some history that is undergoing a revolution of its own. A great place for us to be a part of the vibrant urban culture yet remain grounded by our chestnut roots. Please visit us and experience what our Beer Divergency is all about.
name: Urban Chestnut Brewing Company

description: We are a family-run brewery located in the heart of Ballard, Seattle.
name: Urban Family Brewing

description:
An experimental fermentation center focused on community and education, the Urban Farm Fermentory (UFF) ferments an array of unique products. We spontaneously ferment our array of fresh pressed Maine apple Cider in a Farmhouse style until it's bone dry & tart. Our Mead has a similarly unique flavor, crisper =and more vibrant than many. And our Kombucha (fermented tea) is one of the few true versions left, with 1.5% alcohol and a lambic bite.

Founded in 2010, the UFF was the first brewery/winery to set up shop in Portland, Maine's East Bayside industrial area, which is fast becoming the city's second recognized brewery cluster (including Rising Tide Brewing, Bunker Brewing, and an in-the-works distillery). Come check us out and spread the CULTURE
name: Urban Farm Fermentory

description: Urban Growler Brewing Company (UGBC) is a packaging microbrewery located in St. Paul, Minnesota and opening in 2013. We'll sell our own artisanal beer and food onsite in the brewery taproom and kegs offsite to Metro area retailers.
name: Urban Growler Brewing Company

description:
Urban Legend Brewing Company makes unique beers the traditional way. Beer is our passion. We believe that our beer can make the world and our local community a better place! We use only the highest quality ingredients and make small batches to ensure that we supply our community with the purest, freshest, highest quality beer possible. Our goal is to support local businesses and American manufacturing wherever possible. We are committed to recycling, reusing, and reducing our carbon footprint while at the same time making unique beers for discerning beer lovers and craft beer newbies. We will think local and will contribute to the local economy. 
The beer we produce will be available in our brewery and at local bars, restaurants and liquor stores. Fresh beer always tastes the best! Pints in the taproom, growlers to go, and small scale, local distribution is our way of ensuring our product is in its prime when it gets to your glass. We have a number of staple beers on draught plus we will be providing a rotating line of seasonal and specialty brews. We love to rediscover ancient beer recipes as well as spend a lot of time developing a unique styles.
As we say.....Great Beer, Born Here.
name: Urban Legend Brewing Company

description: Ferndale based brewery specializing in unfiltered, unpretentious Organic beer and food
name: Urbanrest Brewing Company

description: URBN Brewing Co., founded by Alex Carballo, Jon Mangini, and head brewer Callaway Ryan, is a craft brewery located in El Cajon, CA.
name: URBN Brewing Co.

description:
Brewery on the Anschutz Campus

 - Formerly Coda Brewing
name: Ursula Brewing

description:
Ursus Breweries owns three breweries in Romania, Brasov, Buzau and Timisoara and a mini-production facility in Cluj-Napoca. One of three beers consumed by the Romans is a trademark of Ursus Breweries portfolio, which says a lot about the quality of our beers and appreciation that they enjoy among consumers.



Ursus Breweries regulations on the use of the Facebook pages:

By using this site, you agree to the Terms and Conditions Facebook and regulations below. Comments and other material posted by fans and Facebook users do not reflect the views of Ursus Breweries and Ursus Breweries does not validate their accuracy.

Users will post relevant comments and polite to the community. Ursus Breweries will moderate all comments and reserves the right to remove any post that violates these regulations and will block any user who violates regulations repeatedly.

In particular, we will delete comments:
What defame, abuse, harass, threaten or violate the rights of others in any other measure.
What are racist, sexist, homophobic, sexually explicit, abusive or in a any other way unacceptable.
Which contain offensive words or defamatory language.
Which we know or suspect that violate the law or encourage any illegal activity. This includes publishing, posting, distributing or disseminating any material or information that are defamatory, infringing, which are indecent, misleading or illegal.
Promoting products or services for profit.
What are posted to appear on behalf of another person.
What are posted repetitive or not relevant to Ursus Breweries - spam comments.
Including personal contact information such as phone numbers, e-mail or postal addresses.
Describing or encourage activities which could endanger the safety of others, including comments on the abuse of alcohol.

These regulations were designed to help ensure a pleasant our fans. Please respect the regulations every time you enter into dialogue with Ursus Breweries.
name: Ursus Breweries

description:
Wasatch Beers (Schirf Brewing Company) was formed when Greg Schirf found his way to Utah from Milwaukee, America’s beer capital, only to discover that his newly adopted home state did not have a brewery of its own. Recognizing a need and an opportunity, he committed to rectify this situation. In 1986, Schirf opened the first brewery in the resort town of Park City and named his beers after the majestic Wasatch Mountains that rise just east of Salt Lake City. In July 1989, Schirf Brewing opened its new company headquarters and the first brew pub in Utah at the top of historic Main Street in Park City.

In fact, it was Schirf who proposed the bill to the Utah Legislature in 1988 that would make brew pubs legal in Utah. There are now more than 12 thriving brew pubs in the state thanks to Schirf and the bill's sponsor, Senator Mike Demeitrick of Price, Utah.
name: Utah Brewers Cooperative

description: Ute Pass Brewing Company has been the dream of Todd and Scott for over a year now.  After doing a lot of painstaking "research*" and going through a number of possible building sites we have finally found a home.  Located in beautiful downtown Woodland Park, Colorado, the Ute Pass Brewing Company will be a warm and friendly small mountain town brewery for folks to gather around with old friends and to make new ones.  At this time we plan to open as a Tavern by late March 2013 and then have brewery operations as soon as possible.
name: Ute Pass Brewing Company

description: A craft brewery in planning, aiming to use the freshest and most local ingredients available. Our beers are inspired by current trends in the craft beer industry as well as the people and flavors of the Uwharrie region and the Piedmont of North Carolina.
name: Uwharrie Brewing Company, LLC

description:
The story begins...

...when three American friends David Spengler, Tom Crozier, and Matt Walthall decided to brew their own beer at home. They had grown tired of the limited selection, and homogeneous taste, of domestic beer found in Berlin stores, Spätkaufs and restaurants. They shared their creations with friends old and new in an effort to challenge preconceived notions of what beer should and could taste like. Over time, the group improved their skills and began expanding their recipes to include new and original styles of craft beer. In 2011, David, Tom, and Matt decided to take the next step and create a full fledged brewing company. Vagabund Brauerei was born.
name: Vagabund Brauerei

description: Vail Brewing Company (VBC) is a small 10BBL, independent craft brewery located in the heart of the Rocky Mountains. We chose this area not only for the mountain lifestyle, but to also serve the residents and tourist of the Upper Eagle River Valley and ski areas of Vail and Beaver Creek. Our brews will always have a creative touch from big hoppy beers, traditional styles, blends, and even cask-conditioned ales….We brew what we like to drink! We design handcrafted ales and lagers using mountain fed water and the finest ingredients. When available, we will use locally sourced hops and malts. The selection of fine beers will constantly change and evolve with staple beers appearing over time.
name: Vail Brewing Company

description: Just come check us out. You never know what you might find. We have a fun loving environment and we love to see new people.
name: Valhöll Brewing

description: Valiant Brewing Company is a craft brewery in for Orange, California which serves the Southern California area with an exceptional line up of craft beer.
name: Valiant Brewing

description:
Valkyrie Brewing Company (formally known as Viking) is a small, family owned and operated microbrewery located in Northwest Wisconsin in the village of Dallas. Since 1994, Valkyrie has brewed dozens of styles of beer in small, handcrafted batches for our customers' enjoyment.

Valkyrie’s mission is to provide people with excellent tasting, top quality beer. 
We are committed to producing beer that is:
the BEST quality possible
brewed with the finest ingredients available 
made by the most sustainable methods achievable
name: Valkyrie Brewing Company

description:
Vallensons Brewery

Our small home brewery located in Pearland Texas just South of Houston was founded in December 2008. We have been brewing great beers for over 14 years and one day aspire to have our own Nanobrewery. Since any start-up is always tough, we feel starting small and expanding later is the best way to go. 

As a Nanobrewery we brew 1/2  barrel of beer at a time which means we can afford to brew different styles of beer in smaller quantities (less cost) while focusing attention to traditional styles with a creative twist. At Vallensons we like to experiment and thus far our beers have been very successful. 

Vallensons plans to be different then the standard brewery by carving a niche out of the craft brewing industry. Vallensons Brewing Company plans to build its reputation on quality, character and consistency and the best part of it all is that we plan on having fun along the way. We believe that if you put passion into what you love then you will yield success.
name: Vallensons Brewing Company

description:
Since 1853, El Dorado Brewing Company operated in California's Central Valley providing beer for the local residents of San Joaquin county. When the Prohibition Act was passed, the company ceased operations for a period of time but still maintained the recipes and brewing knowledge. In 1994, Kellie Jacobs re-established the operations under the name of Valley Brewing Company Inc. and set out to build Valley Brewing Company into the premier brewery that operated in years past.

Over a decade later, Valley Brewing Company has won numerous awards for various beers such as Uberhoppy, West Coast IPA, Luna Blanca and London Tavern. The London Tavern won a silver medal in the 2010 World Beer Cup and Uberhoppy just recently won another prestigious award in 2011. Valley Brewing Company and will continue it's focus on brewing the San Joaquin Valley's top beers and provide our loyal customers with not only award winning beer but bragging rights that they represent Valley Brew!

Come in and enjoy our award winning beers and enjoy the ambiance of our beautiful microbrewery located in Stockton, California. See you soon.
name: Valley Brewing Company

description: alley Center Brewery is a locally owned and operated, pico brewery located in the hills of North San Diego County, in the town of Valley Center. What started as a homebrewing hobby has blossomed into an idea to produce and develop beer for the local town to support the business and lifestyles of the area. With our unique community surroundings, Valley Center Brewery has developed four mainstay beers for its bottle and keg production, services local restaurants, and provides quality product geared towards Valley Center's taste. We welcome you to pull up a barrel and have a cold one by us!
name: Valley Center Brewery

description: Family-owned craft brewery in planning specializing in unfiltered, cask-conditioned session beers and old style traditions made in small batches with a California perspective, based in Marin County.
name: Van Houten Brewing Co

description:
Van Houzen Brewing Company is a small operation focused on bringing you high-alcohol Artisan Ales.  Founded in early 2011, we completed our build out and became licensed on Oct. 31st, 2011… Halloween.  We are a family owned and operated business set up in the lower level of Sugar Grove Gathering Place in Newton, Iowa.  

Our story began as many others had: a fascination with beer, the many different styles and processes of brewing, the extensive history of this versatile beverage, home brewing, and of course, consumption of beers big and small, from every corner of the world.  The eventual result of all this has evolved into a commercial nano-brewery.  

While our capacity is quite small, all our beers are hand crafted and unfiltered, offering you the most true and pure representation of traditional beer styles.  VHBC employs an all natural brewing process incorporated from Belgian, German, and American brewing practices, executed on a custom designed brewhouse.  

We are excited to offer four styles to the public, available through reputable Cafes and Alehouses in Eastern and Central Iowa.  Ask your local pub to give it a shot, support Iowa beer, and Prost!
name: Van Houzen Brewing Company

description: It's time. The very first brewpub in Eindhoven is a fact. We're called Van Moll. Or you can call us and Jaap and Erwin, because we're called that too. Two men with a passion for beer in the heart of the city. And if you find a brewpub unnecessarily fashionable term - as we do - then just call it a tasting room. Or a pub, because we are also that.
name: Van Moll

description:
VanPort Brewing is a group of friends that all graduated from Portland State University.  In fact between the founding members there are 5 degrees from Portland State University.  We derive our name from the Vanport Flood that destroyed the city of Vanport City, Oregon, in 1948.  Vanport was also the first name of Portland State University.

We are dedicated to creating excellent home brewed beers, with aspirations of producing commercial quality beer.
name: Van Port Brewing

description: What began as a local enterprise is today a global brewing success – Van Pur is now the largest independent Polish brewing company, offering bottom-fermented light beers and non-alcoholic malt beverages. We are also an acknowledged Private Label partner.
name: Van Pur Browar

description:
With humble beginnings as a cider mill in 2006 with a 5,000-square-foot building, Vander Mill began distributing their cider products in 750 ml. glass bottles in 2008 and in draft kegs.

Vander Mill is now distributing their hard cider varieties in convenience and grocery stores, bars, and restaurants throughout Michigan, Illinois, Indiana and Ohio.

“We are going to continue our focus on innovation and creativity with our ciders,” Paul Vander Heide, Owner, said. “But we wanted to take a few of our core products and make them more accessible to customers.”
name: Vander Mill Winery, Cider Mill & Microbrewery

description: A farmwoods brewery at nature's mercy.
name: Vanish

description:
Vashon's only commercial brewery is dedicated to brewing and selling the highest quality draft beer for Vashon Island.

We sell beer in reusable growlers. This keeps our costs down so more people can enjoy affordable, great draft beer at home. We also sell kegs to restaurants at competitive prices.

We reuse and recycle just about everything. Our spent grains help feed island livestock. We collect and store rainwater and cooling water from the brewery to use in our garden.
name: Vashon Brewing Company

description: Vault Brewing Company is a new brewpub slated to open late summer of 2012.  Housed in the original Yardley National Bank building, it will offer a wide selection of seasonal beers, gourmet wood-fired flat breads, and fine tapas – all in an upscale environment that pays homage to the regal and old world era when turn-of-the-century banks were in their glory.  The name comes from the 120-year-old vault at the center of the building which will be showcased in its use as the oak-aging room.
name: Vault Brewing Company

description: The VBBC was started in 2010 by two friends living in Venice that share a love for great beer. In June of 2012, their "VENICE" Amber Ale and "JUNE GLOOM," a Belgian White, hit the market with an overwhelmingly positive response.
name: Venice Beach Beer Company

description:
We are two bartenders from Venice Beach who love good beer. Venice Duck was inspired by a local legend of a guy who went to a party in the Venice canals and woke up the next day on the sidewalk covered with ducks.

We incorporate the Venice culture into our beers and truly believe in the power of the flock, our community. We like to say we are the” unofficial” sponsor of Venice events. We are part of the Venice Chamber of Commerce and participate in local events.
name: Venice Duck Brewery

description:
Verboten is an award-winning artisan craft brewery located in Loveland, Colorado. Our beers are an exciting mix between traditional styles and experimental brews, lovingly fretted over by our brewer, Josh Grenz. Verboten opened in 2013 and in 2014 took home two World Beer Cup medals. 

Carefully handcrafted from conception until our brew fills your glass, Verboten provides an endlessly exciting journey for craft beer lovers. Our tagline is "Beer for All," and we believe there is a perfect beer out there for everyone.
name: Verboten Brewing

description:
The Vermont Beer Co. can be found at The Perfect Pear CafÃ© in Bradford Vermont. Brewing beer on a 10 gallon system allows us to rotate our beers more often and makes us the smallest brewery in Vermont.

We serve our ales exclusively on draft on premise in The Perfect Pear Cafe dining room, out on our deck over-looking the Waits River and coming soon in our new Pub located just under the Pear.

Adam Coulter, enthusiastic home brewer and long time chef of The Perfect Pear has turned in his chef coat and turned his attention to upholding the tradition of brewing great beer in Vermont.

Featuring beers such as Waits River Red Ale, First Tap India Pale Ale & Devil's Den Brown Porter, The Pear offers two rotating house taps as well as two rotating guest taps showcasing some of the finest microbreweries from New England and beyond.
name: Vermont Beer Company

description:
At Woodchuck®, we do things our own way. We start with the finest ingredients crafted at our local cidery here in Middlebury, Vermont. Then our cider-master meticulously oversees the details of every small batch before any bottle or keg leaves our back door. It’s this special attention and love for our product that ensures we always deliver a smooth unique hard cider that is true to our roots. 
Independent to the core®.
name: Vermont Hard Cider Company

description: VPB is the third oldest brewpub on the East Coast.
name: Vermont Pub & Brewery

description:
The early seeds of Vertigo Brewing were sown back in 1995 when Mike Haines and Mike Kinion began experimenting with brewing at U-Brew in Tigard, Oregon. But what began as a light hobby soon developed into a deep passion. They quickly outgrew the offerings of U-Brew and expanded their operation into a homebrew setup. Fifteen years later, the two Mikes have a lot of batches, awards, and experience under their belts. Starting in May of 2008, Vertigo Brewing was christened a fully-licensed brewery in a Hillsboro warehouse. 
Vertigo Brewing is currently operating a one barrel system, producing eight to ten barrels a month. But as demand takes off, the two Mikes are eagerly looking forward to an expanded business operation. Vertigo prides itself on producing a unique blend of beer offerings that manage to stand out in the beer-saturated market of the Northwest.
name: Vertigo Brewing

description: The Veteran Beer Company is dedicated to providing lives of quality for military Veterans through the creation of meaningful post-service careers. The company will produce, sell, and deliver beers of superior quality, striving to employ Veterans in every role within the organization and the supply chain while adhering to the highest principles of military service, conducting business with integrity, courage, and loyalty.
name: Veteran Beer Company

description:
Veterans United Craft Brewery is dedicated to satiating healthy appetites with flavorful beer through the use of fresh, quality ingredients and hope to expand the definition of what beer can be through our hard work and innovation. We also value ideas and technologies that reinforce our social and environmental responsibility to our local community. 

Join us Wednesday through Saturday in our brand new taproom to experience our beer right from the source. We'll be serving our flagship Raging Blonde Ale and Hopbanshee IPA, as well as taproom-exclusive brews and some great guest beers. 

Take home a 32 or 128 oz. Growler or just enjoy a few pints. 

Enjoy a tour of the brewery production area on Saturdays, from 1:30pm–4:30pm (one every hour; cost is $5 and includes a guided tour, tasting glass, and sample pours of our beers on tap).

Keep an eye on our Facebook and Twitter feeds or sign up for our e-newsletter to see when talented local musicians and delicious food trucks will be around. 

Veterans United Craft Brewery is committed to making a positive contribution to Jacksonville and beyond, and we look forward to sharing a pint with you!
name: Veterans United Craft Brewery

description: We have a great desire and ability to brew tasty and distinctive beer, deliver that taste to you and allow you to realize what you have now, open new taste horizons and choose the best!
name: Victory Art Brew

description: Having trained in Germany, we appreciate the artistic freedom we have here in the US. Here creativity is embraced by a fervent core of consumers and we are happy to serve that audience with our experience in traditional methods, selection of choice, often imported ingredients, and the best processing that technology can offer us. We relish the opportunity to please both ourselves and our audience with our flavorful creations.  We've invested more than our lives in this. Take a look at Victory Brewing Company's Beers.
name: Victory Brewing Company

description: In December 1995, the Vierling became one of Michigan’s first brew pubs with the addition of a five barrel micro-brewing system.  The brew equipment, direct from Budapest, Hungary is configured to produce some of the finest ales and lagers in 155 gallon hand-crafted batches.  The relatively small sized batches of beer insures a fast product turn-over which enables the Vierling to serve the freshest beer possible with a multitude of varieties.
name: Vierling Restaurant & Marquette Harbor Brewery

description: Viking Braggot Company is Eugene's newest brewery and the only brewery to offer a full line of braggots! What are braggots? It is one of the oldest fermented drinks, pioneered by the Vikings that takes elements of beer and fermented honey (or mead). We are updating this ancient tradition by creating a modern beverage that combines local honey and organic craft beer ingredients!
name: Viking Braggot Company

description:
Let us gather for mutual benefit. And beer.

Some of the best things happen over beer. Ideas are born, friendships forged, deals struck. Village Brewery began that way too, with friends sharing beers and dreams for a community brewery. A brewery that would support Calgary’s artists and craftspeople. A brewery that would create the excellent ales and lagers our friends and neighbors deserve. It takes a village to raise a beer. And a beer to raise a village.
name: Village Brewery

description:
Our brewery is a 1.5 BBL (46.5 gallons) artisanal, small-batch, neighborhood business brewing quality beer for good people who appreciate good beer.  We offer samples, pints, and growler fills. Our unique tasting room is situated at the location of the former Bridgetown Pub, just a short drive from NJ Turnpike Exit 5 or the Mt. Holly exit off 295. We combine fresh ingredients with beer education and a brewery tour to refresh, enlighten and inform.

Our limited brewery license prevents us from serving food, but  we encourage our customers to carry-in or order delivery from one of the many restaurants in downtown Mt. Holly within walking distance.

Village Idiot Brewing Company is a very unique concept that we have seen blend in and work successfully in other Main Street settings across the country.  Our small size allows us to be nimble and offer tap selections that change frequently.
name: Village Idiot Brewing Company

description: A Brewery Founded on the Principles of Craft and Precision, with an Obsession for the Details of Quality, and a Belief in the Power of Beer to Bring People Together.
name: Vindication Brewing Co.

description:
The fun place to brew your own beer and make your wines!

The only place in the Midwest where you and friends, co-workers, or even family can meet to create your custom beers & wines. We provide the equipment, supplies, recipes, and expert Brew Coaches to assist you. You get the fun & the beverage. We take care of the mess & expertise.
name: Vine Park Brewing Company

description:
Vino's beers are brewed fresh with only the finest natural ingredients. No chemicals and no preservatives. We strive to produce flavorful brews, emphasizing quality not quantity.

In this section of our site, we want to acquaint you with all of our handcrafted ales, give you a brief overview of the history of beer, and introduce you to a few brewing terms in an attempt to expand your understanding of the process. Once you've checked out all of our brews, you might want to learn more about our brewing process and our head brewer.

Try one of Vino's brews on your next visit with a great pizza or calzone, or take one home to drink later in one of our convenient growlers. We think you will enjoy the unique flavors of our fresh, handcrafted ales!
name: Vino's Pizza Pub & Brewery

description:
Arista Wines, a division of A. Lassonde Inc., was founded in 2006 and is positioned as a leader in the development, packaging and marketing of wines, ciders and alcoholic products differentiated in quality packaging and innovative.

Available in a multitude of formats and qualities, our products will compliment your special occasions and festivities throughout the year.
name: Vins Arista

description: Vintage 50, at this Leesburg, Virginia classically modern brewery.  Whether you enjoy a fine California cabernet paired with innovative New American fare, or a cold beer brewed on-site paired with classic comfort food, you will feel at home at Vintage 50. Guests will relax in style while enjoying libations from near and far as well as a menu that features fresh, seasonal ingredients.
name: Vintage 50 Restaurant and Brew Lounge

description:
In 2002 Brittany, Trent & Mark Kraemer opened Vintage Spirits & Grill on the corner of University & Frances near the UW-Madison campus.

In 2009, they, along with Bryan & Scott Manning and Mike Bridges decided to expand their family business and took over the vacant space formerly occupied by JT Whitneys.

They brought in a creative culinary team and set about creating a restaurant and brewery that features both excellent made-from-scratch food, and outstanding hand crafted beers.

"At Vintage Brewing Company, we're dedicated to bringing you world-class beer: fresh, flavorful, varied, & distinctive. We champion the craft of beer brewing as a harmony of art and science, where hard work and precision are guided by vision and passion. Cheers to great beer!"
name: Vintage Brewing Co

description: Virtue works in partnership with local farmers, using the highest quality Midwestern heirloom apples, to produce ciders that combine old world traditions with modern craft cider fermentation and aging techniques. Our cider house is located in Fennville, Michigan.
name: Virtue Cider

description: Volcano Brewing Company is a microbrewery hotel overlooking Lake Arenal in Tilarán, Costa Rica, perfectly situated next to some of the best Costa Rican adventure sports such as kitesurfing, windsurfing, white-water rafting, ziplining, hot springs, horseback riding, and nature reserves.  Guests can stop by for a meal and drink or stay at the hotel for an all-inclusive package which includes all you can eat and drink, plus access to on-site amenities such as a pool overlooking Lake Arenal, heated jacuzzi, huge concrete skatepark, tennis court, nature trails, billiards, foosball, board games, and free Wi-fi.  VBC serves its own microbrews, including Witch's Rock Pale Ale and Gato Malo (a brown ale).
name: Volcano Brewing Company

description: When we found that something had been lost to industrialised Beer we started making our own Craft Beer. This is when we founded the von Freude Microbrewery . von Freude stands for the Making of Modern Craft Beers with the techniques of endurable Craftsmanship.
name: Von Freude

description:
As Von Jakob Vineyard, we have brought exceptional wines to the Southern Illinois area and beyond for over 15 years. Now, we are excited to introduce Von Jakob Brewery, complete with hand-crafted brews, made exclusively at our Orchard location in Alto Pass, Illinois.

Offering eight styles of beer ranging from our crisp, clean, lightly-hopped American Pilsner to our rich, dark Stout, you are sure to find a beer that delights your palate. Or, if you are having trouble choosing just one, we offer a flight of all eight delicious beers. We also have a great selection of domestic beers as well as premium beers from around the world for your enjoyment.

And for our wine enthusiasts out there, do not worry – our winery isn’t going anywhere. We just thought we would offer you a different libation of choice, should you want to explore it.

We sincerely thank you for your support over the years, and we welcome you to come and experience this next adventure with us!
name: Von Jakob Brewery
